40014036	Koti ekŋenaŋ Zisas kapigok wekuwien, “Nâmndemane am zawalinmagaŋ sekdi atait ma notnaŋaŋ sâkdi busiliŋaŋ etaŋ timekti zawalin ŋep delaŋ zesem.” Kegok zemti ekŋenaŋ kegok mti alik bemâbien.
40015001	Kan keyet Zelusalem mkaengatnaŋ zii zet zikat indanda ma Palisi notnaŋ ekŋenaŋ Zisasmagen koti yaŋkwesimti zewien,
40015002	“Nembandine ekŋenaŋ eneyet yeŋsokŋine ekŋengalen zii zet taaŋgosoip? Meu niniyelen kananen bet zululugat set bembeŋaŋ ke ku mamâlip.”
40015003	Kegok yaŋkwesime Zisasiyaŋ diindoye, “In zigogat ilinaŋgalen mama mimi gawepumti Kawawaŋgalen zii zet ke mamimyuŋguip?
40015004	Kawawaŋgalen zet kapigok tazin, ‘Geŋ mamdi bipdi eksemindewanik,’ (Kisim Bek 20:12) ma ŋen ‘an ŋenaŋ mamaŋ ma bipmaŋgat kwelat zet kuwe beme gakikiyet zapat bewe.’ (Kisim Bek 21:17)
40015005	Yaŋgut in kapigok manzeip, ‘An ŋen egaŋ mamaŋ ma bipmaŋgat kapigok manzein, “Kwitnaŋ kwitnaŋ it idamti idamukulem mbak yaŋgut keyaŋ neŋ Kawawaŋgat tewalaŋ msasayelen.” ‘
40015006	Am notnaŋaŋ kegok mme in kapigok manzeip, ‘Mamin biwinaŋgat ŋep ku eksemindendeyelen.’ In kegok mti Kawawaŋgalen zet mtopemti ilinaŋgalen mama mimi itnaŋaŋ mamâlip.
40015007	In an zetgalen etaŋ! In an keboŋgat golaŋ zenze an Aizayayaŋ zet ŋen kapigok kuye,
40015008	‘In nâgât belak zelaŋ etaŋ manzeip. In neŋ mandiindoyap ke ku maŋgawepup.
40015009	In nâlen zii zet ku tazikat indaip. In ilinaŋgalen zii zet zenâm mip sepem kegogak ke nâlen zii zetnok beingapmti nâgât sekŋinan etaŋ masesewatneip.’ “ (Aizaya 29:13)
40015010	Zisas ek zet kegok diindomti am sambe indamandame kopme diindoye, “Neŋ zet diindoma wakbemtati nâmâtâlit!
40015011	Anaŋ meu manin ke Kawawaŋaŋmak mama main ku mambekekzin. Keyaŋgut bekanaŋ keŋangatnaŋ makwazin keyaŋ mme yommak mambein.”
40015012	Kegok zeme nembaŋane nin egat kandaŋan meti dunduwenn, “Gâlen zet Palisi ekŋen diindonak keyaŋ keŋin mme kipmaŋ bein. Ke nânik?”
40015013	Zemann Zisasiyaŋ kapigok dinndoye, “Bien kululuŋen tazin egalen mulupmanen tep msikokok notnaŋ ondemti notnaŋaŋ belak kwakwatnaŋ ke egaŋ kiŋdiŋaŋ melesiŋ seluwe.
40015014	Keyepmti in Palisi ekŋen katikindeit. Ekŋen zikalin beŋaŋnok ya zikalin beŋaŋ keyaŋ beŋaŋ notnaŋ ekŋen indamukulem msâgât tapmip yaŋgut an zikatnaŋ beŋaŋaŋ zikatnaŋ beŋaŋ ikŋaŋ nemboŋak teti medak beme ilisakwep aimboŋan towebuk.”
40015015	Kegok zeme Pitayaŋ kapigok dunduye, “Geŋ bemzenze zet zenak keyet yaŋaŋ zemane nâne.”
40015016	Zeme Zisasiyaŋ dinndoye. “In ewe keyet yaŋaŋ nâmâtâtâpiŋ mamaip?
40015017	Keyepmti in kegogak ku nâip. Kaŋgaleminan meu nime kambakŋinaŋ toweti setnaset makwawezin.
40015018	Yaŋgut keŋ otnânânaset bekanaŋ makwazin keyaŋ mme nin Kawawaŋgat zikatnan yommak mambenup.
40015019	Amgat keŋangatnaŋ ŋoktik bekanaŋ makwazin keyaŋ mme sesepem kapigok masokbeip: Am indome gakiki, awembiŋ kalalaŋ mti mama, an imbi kambu wawat ma imbiyaŋ kegogak mamip, ma set kileŋ mama, kambu titi ma zet dâsuki zenze ma notnaŋgat zet kwelat kuku.
40015020	Mama mimi keboŋaŋ Kawawaŋgat zikatnan pembenaŋ ku bein yaŋgut bet ku zuluti meu niniyelen zet keyaŋ Kawawaŋgat zikatnan mme yommak ku talip.”
40015021	Âpme Zisas ma nembaŋane nin mka ke pemti Taia ma Saidon mka temaŋ zut keyet ganzenan mebenn.
40015022	Met mamann imbi ŋen Kenan msalengatnaŋ keyaŋ koti Zisasiyet kwizet temaŋ penaŋ kumti zeye, “Amobotnaŋ, geŋ Dewitgalen alikŋaŋaŋ, ya nâgât keŋdi bugan kembeŋ nâne. Nemban we bekanaŋaŋ igagen penaŋ maoyak sain.”
40015023	Kegok zeme Zisasiyaŋ nâmtiŋgut zet dopmaŋ ŋen ku gilik zem saye. Kegok mme nembaŋane nin egat zewenn, “Geŋ imbi belak zempemane melak! Ek ningat bamenen koti kwizet takuŋkozin.”
40015024	Zemann imbi ke dunduye, “Neŋ Kawawaŋaŋ Islael maŋge sipsip galaŋ zenzeŋaŋ keboŋ keyet zemneme kwatoban.”
40015025	Zeme imbiyaŋ koti Zisasiyet kendaŋaŋ pedondom samti zeye, “Amobotnaŋ, geŋ namukulem mne.”
40015026	Kegok zeme Zisasiyaŋ ewe dunduye, “An imbi nemba ekŋengalen meu butnaŋ mti tam indame ŋep ku benak.”
40015027	Zeme zet dopmaŋ kapigok gilik zemti saye, “Amobotnaŋ, neŋ Islael maŋgeen ku sokbembeŋaŋ e ŋep zenik, yaŋgut tam ekŋenaŋ meu pâpmaŋ toweme ke ŋep manip.”
40015028	Kegok zeme nâmti pigok zeye, “Imbi, nâmkiŋpependi temaŋ penaŋ. Keyepmti yaŋkwesinik keyet kataŋ ŋep sokbemgasem.” Zisasiyaŋ kegok zeme keyegak nembaŋaŋ dolakŋaŋ beye.
40015029	Âpme Zisasiyaŋ msat keyet peme tapme Galili tundua ganzenaset meti kalaŋan pataŋ zemti mot totage.
40015030	Am sambe penaŋ ekŋenaŋ ekmagen kopmâbien. Am notnaŋ sebelin wesiŋ ma zikalin beŋaŋ ma am kopa ma zawalinmak notnaŋ sambe indatimti Zisasiyet kandaŋan maŋge bemindeme indaweyaŋ indeye.
40015031	Âpme am kopa ekŋenaŋ zet zewien ma sebelin wesiŋ ekŋenaŋ pembenaŋ bewien ma zikalin beŋaŋ ekŋenaŋ zikalin ekbien. Ke mme amnaŋ ke ekti nâmtemtem mti Islael am ekŋengalen Kawawaŋ zemsesewatpewien.
40015032	Kegok mti egaŋ nembaŋane nin dinndoye, “Am kasup tuk ninmak tapmien ya alak meuŋinpiŋ talipgapmti neŋ am ekŋengat kembeŋ penaŋ miyap. Mneti meupiŋ zemindema meti selen meuyet zikat gililiŋ mseip keyet yayaŋ mimindeyap.”
40015033	Zeme nin yaŋkwesiwenn, “Msat tuŋgupman pi meu desetgatnaŋ aikti indasenup ma am sambe penaŋ indamann nime ŋep bemindesem?”
40015034	Kegok yaŋkwesimann egaŋ gilik zem ndayaŋkwesimti zeye, “Inmagen nupmamaŋ zigok tazin?” Kegok ndayaŋkwesime nin zewenn, “Nupmamaŋ 7 ma aŋgala isikŋaŋ bugan tazin.”
40015035	Kegok zemann Zisasiyaŋ am zemindeme totabien.
40015036	Totapme egaŋ nupmamaŋ 7 ma aŋgala ke mti Kawawaŋgat, “Wisikŋ,” zemti mutumti nembaŋane nin ndame am kalaŋti indawenn.
40015037	Indamepmann am sambe ekŋenaŋ nim kiŋgapme butnaŋ tapmege ke makumti beme tise 7 gak zem tage.
40015038	Meu nimbien ke an ekŋen makumann 4 tausen kegok bewien. Âpme imbi ma nemba ekŋen ku indamakuwien.
40015039	Kegok mti egaŋ am zemindeme mekopme ek ma nembaŋane nsakwep waŋgaen moti met Magadan msalen pataŋ zewenn.
40016001	Âpme Palisi ma Sadusi ekŋenaŋ Zisasmagen koti tetimaemaeyelen toweme ekne zemti mbien, “Geŋ menok mmane nin Kawawaŋgalen windeŋaŋ geŋmak tazin beme eksenup.”
40016002	Kegok zeme egaŋ diindoye, “In kululuŋ piliŋ piliŋ penaŋ tapme ilak mtete kan bein manzeip.
40016003	Ma mseŋan manzeip, ‘Kululuŋ sop kumti map tosâpm,’ manzeip. In kululuŋen ekme mopme msat keyet sepemaŋ eknâmamip keyaŋgut nâlen muluwaŋ masokbein ke eknâm mamiwaŋgut weyaŋti yaŋaŋ ku maeknâmâtâlip.
40016004	In am msat alak kan kapiyet talip in bekanaŋ penaŋ ma Kawawaŋ mambamkumpemti mamaip. In neŋ menok mimiyet nâmti tatnapitilip? O alak yek, yaŋgut in menok kwewetaŋ Kawawaŋaŋ golaŋ zenze an Zonamagen mgeen keboŋ bam ekbep. Menok ŋen ku msap.” Kegok zemti indem mege.
40016005	Âpme nembaŋane nin meun kandati pemann tapme Zisasmak nin tundua kutumti nembet motiŋgut otnâmbenn.
40016006	Moti Zisasiyaŋ kapigok dinndoye, “In Palisi ma Sadusi ekŋengalen yis plawa manzim semen keyet weyaŋ eksemti mambep.”
40016007	Kegok zeme nin nâwennen egaŋ nupmamaŋgat tazen ke nâmti nin kegok otnâmti zenâ zenâ mbenn, “Meu ku mkotngapmti kegok zein.”
40016008	Zet kegok tazemann Zisasiyaŋ nâmti ndayaŋkwesiye, “In kwilekiyet meu kum kolo keyet zenâ zenâ tapmip? Nâmkiŋpepeŋin âlâgâlâk.
40016009	Neŋ ŋep menok mti meu aikbak. In ke ku nâmâtâlip, ma? Neŋ nupmamaŋ keyaŋ an 5,000 indama nimkiŋgapme butnaŋ tapme tise zigok beme gak zeye? In ke ku nâmtalip?
40016010	Ma nupmamaŋ 7 ke timti keyaŋ an 4,000 indama nimkiŋgepme in maiŋ timti tise zigok beme gak zeye?
40016011	Neŋ melesiŋ palawa manzim semen keyet penaŋgat ku zeya. Neŋ bemzenze zet zema in eneyet ku nâmâtâlo? Palisi ma Sadusi ekŋengalen zet dâsukiyet weyaŋ eksemti mambep keyet kegok zeya!”
40016012	Zet kegok dinndome nembaŋane nin nâmâtâbenn ke nupmamaŋgalen melesiŋ palawa manzim semen keyet ku dinndoye keyaŋgut egaŋ golaŋ zet Palisi ma Sadusi ekŋengalen zet dâsuki mâbiek keyet nâmti dinndoye.
40016013	Zisas egaŋ Sisalia Pilipai mka temaŋen keyet sokŋanik kot pataŋ zemti nembaŋane ningat ndayaŋkwesiye, “Am ekŋenaŋ Angat Nemuŋaŋ nâgât kwi manzeip?”
40016014	Kegok zeme nin dunduwenn, “Notnaŋ ekŋenaŋ, ‘Zân tu zululut,’ an manzeip. Notnaŋaŋ, ‘Ilaiza,’ manzeip ma notnaŋaŋ, ‘Zelemaia,’ ma, ‘Golaŋ zenze an notnaŋ itnaŋaŋ,’ manzeip.”
40016015	Kegok dundumann ndayaŋkwesiye, “Âpme in nâgât kwi manzeip?”
40016016	Kegok ndayaŋkwesime Saimon Pitayaŋ zeye, “Geŋ Kilais, Kawawaŋaŋ an ombempepeŋaŋ ke ilak geŋ. Kawawaŋ kwesiŋ kwesiŋ mambe egat Nemuŋaŋ.”
40016017	Zeme Zisasiyaŋ Saimon Pitayet zeye, “Saimon Zonayet nemuŋaŋ, gâgât nâma tikŋaŋ bein. Nânâ ke am ŋenaŋ ku zemgap. Bipm kululuŋenaŋ zemkawaŋ bemgain.
40016018	Keyepm gâgât zeyap, geŋ kwidi alakŋaŋ Pita. (Ningalen zeleset ‘nanzaŋ katikŋaŋ’.) Geŋ zenak, nâgât Kawawaŋgat Nemuŋaŋ zenak. Zet ke ŋotekŋaŋ penaŋ keyepmti nâgât amnaŋ nâmkiŋpemneme ondek indema Sadaŋgalen windeŋaŋaŋ ku indawalabe.
40016019	Neŋ winden gama geŋ am ekŋen Kawawaŋgalen Zet Zapat Dolakŋaŋ Penaŋ mkawaŋ bemane ekŋenaŋ nâgât nâmkiŋpewep beme geŋ ekŋengat pigok diindowanik, ‘In Kawawaŋgalen zemâtâtâtgat katnanen mama keŋan ŋep mebep.’ Kegok zewanik. Kegok mmane Kawawaŋaŋ nâmti zewe, ‘Am in ke nâlen zemâtâtâtgat katnanen mama keŋan ŋep kobep.’ Kegok zewe. Âpme naman geŋ am ekŋen Kawawaŋgalen Zet Zapat Dolakŋaŋ Penaŋ mkawaŋ bemane ekŋenaŋ nâgât ku nâmkiŋpewep beme geŋ ekŋengat pigok diindowanik, ‘In Kawawaŋgalen zemâtâtâtgat katnanen mama keŋan ŋep ku mebep.’ Kegok zewanik. Kegok mmane Kawawaŋaŋ nâmti zewe, ‘Am in ke nâlen zemâtâtâtgat katnanen mama keŋan ŋep ku kobep.’ “ Kegok zewe.
40016020	Kegok zemti nembaŋane nin zemkatik bem ndemti zeye, “Neŋ kwitn Kilais keyet zapatnaŋ am ŋen ku diindome nâmbep.”
40016021	Kan keyetnaŋ Zisasiyaŋ yaŋbemti nembaŋane nin kapigok zemkawaŋ bemndeye, “Neŋ Zelusalem mkaen mopma sesewat mka temaŋgalen an damuŋ ma sâpe sâpe bumbu an ŋeŋaŋ ma an zii zet zikat indanda ekŋenaŋ sek sindem namti gakikien newep. Keyaŋgut kasup mulup mimi tuk delaŋ zeme neŋ gilik zem wati mamaen kwabap.”
40016022	Kegok dinndome Pitayaŋ Zisas igak zem mandamti zemkulumpemti dunduye, “Amobotnaŋ, geŋ Kawawaŋaŋ aŋgalaŋ geme kwitnaŋ kwitnaŋ keboŋaŋ ku sokbemgawe penaŋ.”
40016023	Zeme Zisasiyaŋ gilik zemti Pita pigok dunduye, “Sadaŋ, geŋ sebe! Geŋ setn bekeknik. Geŋ zet zenik ke Kawawaŋgalen ŋoktikŋaŋgatnaŋ yek, amgat ŋoktikŋinan etaŋ tazinen ke nânik.”
40016024	Kan keyegak Zisasiyaŋ nembaŋane nin pigok dinndoye, “In neŋ nâmâsât mbep beme in sekŋinaŋgalen tikŋaŋ bamkumpemti in zewep, ‘Neŋ ikŋaŋ gakiwe kegogak neŋ mopmaneti gakiwap beme keyaŋ ŋep bewe’.
40016025	Âpme an ŋen ek sekŋaŋgat yayaŋ mti zewe, ‘Neŋ ekmak ku gakiwap,’ zewe beme mama kanzizit ku tasawe. Ma an ŋen egaŋ sekŋaŋ nâgât talasiwe beme mama kanzizit ke ŋep tiwe.
40016026	An ŋen ek msat palengalen kwitnaŋ kwitnaŋ sambe matim nalakzin beme egaŋ gakimti Kawawaŋgat, ‘Mama kanzizit tosayaŋ kwitiwap’ ke ku zewe.
40016027	Nâip, neŋ Angat Nemuŋaŋ nen Bipmnaŋgalen windeŋaŋ ma busatnaŋaŋ keŋanen enselmak nenmak kwatobap. Kwatoti an imbi sambe mamaŋinaŋgat sepem dopmaŋ mutumindawap.
40016028	Neŋ penaŋ sukwep diindoma nâit, in alak talip kapi notnaŋ gakikipiŋ tapme neŋ Angat Nemuŋaŋ winden sosok mkawaŋ bemti mulupm mma eksâip.”
40017001	Âpme egaŋ gakimti wawatnaŋgat zapatnaŋ nembaŋane ningat mimindamti kasup mulup mimi 6 delaŋ peme keyet palaŋan Zisasiyaŋ Pita ma Zemsmak meniŋaŋ Zân indaikti ilinak kalaŋ ŋengat mowebien.
40017002	Motati ekme Zisasiyet sek sepemaŋ asekti mamanamaŋ beme zimosetnaŋ busatnaŋ kasup nemboŋ sokbeme melakanduŋaŋ busatnaŋ leŋganaŋ beye.
40017003	Kegok sokbeme nembaŋane tuk ekŋenaŋ Mosesimak Ilaiza kululuŋengatnaŋ koti Zisasmak zapat tapmmalu indikbien.
40017004	Keyepmti Pitayaŋ zemkawaŋ bemti Zisasiyet zeye, “Amobotnaŋ, kapi tatnup pembenaŋ penaŋ! Nâmane ŋep beme mzalaŋ tuk walasenup kwep gâgât ŋen Mosesiyet ma ŋen Ilaizayet.”
40017005	Kegok zeme zanza busatnaŋaŋmak piyaŋ indasumuŋme zanza keŋanen zet ŋande ŋenaŋ kapigok zeye, “Kapi nanaŋgat Nemun penaŋ; egat nâmtikŋaŋ mampeyap. Neŋ ek ombempewanaŋ am yomengatnaŋ indati kwabe keyet oloŋen miap. In egat zetnaŋ gawepuwep.”
40017006	Kegok mme nembaŋane ekŋenaŋ zet ŋande ke nâmti igagen kiŋgati ŋenzimoselin ambulut tabien.
40017007	Mme Zisasiyaŋ kot indataŋgumti zeye, “Walit, ku kiŋgalit.”
40017008	Zeme ekŋenaŋ ekme am ŋenpiŋ; Zisasiyaŋ igak tage.
40017009	Keyetnan toti Zisasiyaŋ zemkulumindemti zeye, “In kwitnaŋ mamanamaŋ ego ke am ŋen diindondopiŋ tapme neŋ Angat Nemuŋaŋaŋ gakikiengatnaŋ gilik zem wapmaŋgut.”
40017010	Zeme nembaŋaneyaŋ egat yaŋkwesiwien, “Kwilekiyet mti zii zet zikat indanda an ekŋenaŋ Ilaizayaŋ kukŋaŋgat kopme Mesaya An Kawawaŋaŋ amŋane yomengatnaŋ timekwatindendeyet ombempeye keyaŋ bam kobe manzeip?”
40017011	Zeme Zisasiyaŋ pigok zeye, “An ŋen sepemaŋ Ilaizanok kukŋaŋgat penaŋ koti am ŋoktikŋin mkawaŋ bemindemti kwitnaŋ kwitnaŋ sambe weyaŋme pembenaŋ bewe.
40017012	Yaŋgut neŋ pigok diindowi: An ke Ilaizanok tipman baen kopme am ekŋenaŋ ku nâmâtâti yuŋgu yuŋgu msawien. Sepem kegok yegak neŋ Angat Nemuŋaŋ yuŋgum nawep.”
40017013	Zeme nembaŋane nin zet ke Zân tu zululut angat tazein ke nâmbenn.
40017014	Kegok mti Zisasmak nembaŋane nin am maŋgeen kopataŋ zemann an ŋen Zisasiyet kandaŋan kot pedondom tati
40017015	zeye, “Amobotnaŋ, nâgât nemunaŋgat kembeŋ mi. Ek miakimbe omba kan kataŋ sokbemsame tewen ma tuyen matozin.
40017016	Kegok mame neŋ nembandine ekŋenmagen tetim kopma ekŋenaŋ ŋep ku weyaŋpeyo.”
40017017	Zeme Zisasiyaŋ zeye, “In nâmkiŋpepeŋinpiŋ. In set teŋ ku mamâlip! Neŋ inmak kwesiŋ mamti indamukulem mma ewe in nâgât ku nâmkiŋpenep. Anemba neŋmagen tetim kolit.”
40017018	Aik kopme Zisasiyaŋ we bekanaŋ zet msame keyegak nemba pemti mepme nembayaŋ dolakŋaŋ beye.
40017019	Âpme nembaŋane nin Zisas igak tapme koti yaŋkwesiwenn, “Nin eneyet we bekanaŋ mâpmâgat olapmann bep?”
40017020	Zemann dinndoye, “Nâmkiŋpepeŋin âlâgâlâk keyepmti we bekanaŋ ke ku zempeyo. Neŋ penaŋ diindowi, in nâmkiŋpepeŋin penaŋaŋ isikŋaŋ bugan kabis alik katnaŋ isikŋaŋ bugan keboŋ taindanak beme nukŋaŋ kapi delaŋ zek zeme ŋep delaŋ zemâtnak. In kwileki ŋengat ku olabiek.”
40017021	[We bekanaŋ ekŋen keboŋ ke kwileki ŋen belakŋaŋaŋ ku indamâbâgalen.]
40017022	Âpme maneti nembaŋane nin nsakwep Galili msalen meti Zisasiyaŋ nin kapigok dinndoye, “Pi maman kan belaknik neŋ Angat Nemuŋaŋ am ekŋengat belinan neme mopma
40017023	nome gakimti kasup tuk tati wabap.” Kegok zeme nâmti nin kembeŋ penaŋ mbenn.
40017024	Âpme Zisas ma nembaŋane nin Kapenuam mkaen koti sesewat mkayelen takis titi an ekŋenaŋ koti Pita yaŋkwesiwien, “Ingalen an zikat indandaŋin sesewat mka temaŋgalen takis ke mambein, ma?”
40017025	Kegok zeme Pitayaŋ zeye, “Âk. Mambein.” Kegok zemti Zisasiyaŋ mka mawemtanen moti zet ewe dundupiŋ tapme Zisasiyaŋ yaŋkwesimti zeye, “Saimon, geŋ zigok nânik? Msalengalen amobotnaŋ ekŋenaŋ takis kwimagen matip? Noline ekŋenmagen ma maŋge notnaŋ ekŋenmagen matip?”
40017026	Zeme Pitayaŋ zeye, “Maŋge notnaŋ ekŋenaŋ mambeip; noline ekŋenaŋ ku mambeip.” Zeme Zisasiyaŋ zeye, “Neŋ Kawawaŋgat Nemuŋaŋ keyepm neŋ ku bewakgalenaŋgut beyap.
40017027	Mneti nin ekŋen ku indamann ŋenzinziŋ mseip keyepm tunduaen meti uk pemane towepme aŋgala ŋen ŋeŋaŋ mandasenigen keyet kaŋgalemaŋ keŋan mânep mti geŋ sesewat mka temaŋgalen takis nâgât ma gâgât sepem bembeyelen aiksenik. Ke mmeti ndaŋgat takis besenik.”
40018001	Kan keyet nembaŋane nin Zisasmagen koti yaŋkwesiwenn,” Kwiyaŋ Kawawaŋgalen zemâtâtâtgat katnanen mama keŋangalen amobotnaŋ bein?”
40018002	Âpme Zisasiyaŋ nemba isikŋaŋ ŋen zeme kopme tuŋguwinan pemti
40018003	zeye, “Neŋ penaŋ sukwep diindowi, in keŋin ku gilik zeme nemunamba isikŋaŋ ekŋengat sepem mambe beme Kawawaŋgalen zemâtâtâtgat katnanen mama keŋan ku mobep.
40018004	An ŋenaŋ ikŋaŋgat nâme topme nemba isikŋaŋnok mambe beme egaŋ Kawawaŋgalen zemâtâtâtgat katnanen mama keyet keŋan ŋeŋaŋ bein.
40018005	Geŋ neŋmak tusuwanan keyepm geŋ nemba isikŋaŋnok ke mukulem mbanik beme geŋ neŋ namukulem mnewanik bein.
40018006	An ŋenaŋ nemba isikŋaŋnok ekŋengat nâmkiŋpepeŋin walebe beme ek ke nanzaŋ siput temaŋ bimanen andopemti âtâpeme nembu keŋan towebe keyaŋ nukŋaŋ ku ben. Kawawaŋgalen zemdelaŋ zenze katnaŋ dopmaŋ nukŋaŋ penaŋ tiwe.
40018007	Wakae, msat palen inmagen sindem omba penaŋ tiwep enenogat msalen bekanaŋ mimi omba penaŋ tazin ma yommagen keŋ yuŋguŋgu omba wen ma ŋen an ŋenaŋ notnaŋaŋ zet kelakŋaŋ mti yom mbalup beme Kawawaŋaŋ an zet kelakŋaŋ mbe ke sindem omba penaŋ sawe.
40018008	Keyepm sedaŋ ma bedaŋ yomeset gatetimti mesât mbe beme eleŋgempemane mepme wesiŋ mambanik. Mineti geŋ sedi bedi ilindiŋ mmaneti teziŋ ŋandaŋ towebanigat ŋen eleŋgemti pemane mebe.
40018009	Ma zikatdaŋ mme bekanaset gatetimti mesât mbanik beme geŋ kwenzempemane mepme nembet etaŋgat mambanik. Mineti geŋ zikadi ilindiŋ mmaneti teziŋ ŋandaŋ towebanikgat ŋen kwenzempemane mebe.
40018010	Weyaŋ ekti mambep. In maŋgeŋine nemba isikŋaŋnok ekŋengat nâme tototnaŋ penaŋ ku bewep. Neŋ keyet zema nâit, enselŋine kululuŋen maip ekŋenaŋ Biengat zimosetnan mamaip ekŋenaŋ in zem indowep.
40018011	[Angat Nemuŋaŋ neŋ am galaŋpepeŋaŋ indatimat titiyelen toban.]
40018012	In zigok manâip? An ŋen sipsipmaŋ 100 mamambiegaŋ ekŋenmagengatnaŋ kwep galaŋ zenak beme zigok mnak? Egaŋ 99 indeme tapme kwep galaŋ zenak keyet didikŋan timatnak.
40018013	Neŋ penaŋ diindoyap, ek matimatneti aikzin beme 99 ekŋengat oloŋen ku mti kwep galaŋ zenzeŋaŋ keyet oloŋen penaŋ mnak.
40018014	Sekam kegogak Biwin kululuŋenaŋ nemba isikŋaŋnok kwep ŋenaŋ ku galaŋ zenzeyelen maotnâin.
40018015	Âpme nodaŋ geŋmagen yom aikzin beme geŋ gitak buzagen yomaŋ zemzikat samane egaŋ zedi nâin beme geŋ nâmane delaŋ zeme notn mpewanik.
40018016	Âk egaŋ zedi ku nâme geŋ an kwep ma zut indatetimti yaŋaŋ ilinsakwep nâmti in yom ke mukulem mpemti bandim bandim mti zikat sawep.
40018017	Yaŋgut egaŋ ingalen zelin ku nâme dapmelaŋge ekŋenmak weyaŋ bep. Dapmelaŋgeyet zelin kulume egat nâme nâmkiŋpepeŋepiŋ beme egat zewep ek an zet kululu keboŋ bein.
40018018	Âpme neŋ penaŋ sukwep diindowi, neŋ winden gama geŋ am ekŋen Kawawaŋgalen Zet Zapat Dolakŋaŋ Penaŋ mkawaŋ bemane ekŋenaŋ nâgât nâmkiŋpewep beme geŋ ekŋengat pigok diindowanik, ‘In Kawawaŋgalen zemâtâtâtgat katnan mama keyet keŋan ŋep mebep.’ Kegok mmane Kawawaŋaŋ nâmti zewe, ‘Am in ke nâlen zemâtâtâtgat katnanen mama keyet keŋan ŋep kobep.’ Kegok zewe. Âpme naman geŋ am ekŋen Kawawaŋgalen Zet Zapat Dolakŋaŋ Penaŋ mkawaŋ bemane ekŋenaŋ nâgât ku nâmkiŋpewep beme geŋ ekŋengat pigok diindowanik, ‘Kawawaŋgalen zemâtâtâtgat katnan mama keyet keŋan ŋep ku mebep.’ Kegok mmane Kawawaŋaŋ nâmti zewe, ‘Am in ke nâlen zemâtâtâtgat mama keyet keŋan ŋep ku kobep.’ Kegok zewe.
40018019	-
40018020	Ma neŋ ewe tusumti diindowi, an zut tuk ekŋenaŋ neŋmak tusumti ondekbep beme neŋ ekŋengat tuŋguwinan mamti egat zut egelaŋ kwileki ŋengat keŋ kwep bemti dundumalu Biwin kululuŋenaŋ nâmindawe.”
40018021	Zeme Pitayaŋ Zisasmagen koti zeye, “Amobotnaŋ, âpme notn ŋenaŋ yom mname sek zigok beme neŋ yomaŋ katikpewap? Sek 7 katikpewap, ma?”
40018022	Yaŋkwesime Zisasiyaŋ dunduye, “Sek 7 yek. Sek sambe yomaŋ katikpemti ku makuwanik.
40018023	Neŋ kapigok diindowi, Kawawaŋgalen zemâtâtâtgat katnan mama ke kapigok, kan ŋengat amobotnaŋ ŋenaŋ sisiliŋ anene dopmaŋ mutumsasayelen indamandaye.
40018024	Yaŋbemti kwep kukŋaŋgat aikobien egalen dopmaŋaŋ mânep temaŋ penaŋ.
40018025	Egaŋ dopmaŋ temaŋ ke ŋep mututuyelen ku tasaye keyepm amobotnaŋaŋ an ikŋaŋ ke ma imbi nembaŋane ke mânep tosaŋaŋ mututuyelen ma mka ma bo milawatnaŋ ilindiŋ am belakŋaŋ ekŋenaŋ kwitime mânep dopmaŋ ke titiyelen zeye.
40018026	Kegok zeme sisiliŋ anaŋ amobotnaŋgat kandaŋan pedondom samti zekâkât mpemti zeye, ‘Amobotnaŋŋ, geŋ naŋgalaŋmane neŋ gâlen mânep ilindiŋ ŋep gawap.’
40018027	Zekâkât kegok mti dundum same amobotnaŋaŋ kembeŋ mti dopmaŋ ku mututuyelen zeye.
40018028	Kegok zempeme egaŋ toti mulup an notnaŋ ŋen ekmagen mânep isikŋaŋ mge ekmagen dopmaŋ titiyelen aikti bimaŋ misik misik mti zeye, ‘Geŋ nâlen mânep dopmaŋ geŋmagen tazin ke mutumna.’
40018029	Kegok zeme an notnaŋaŋ egat kandaŋan pedondom samti zekâkât mpemti zeye, ‘Geŋ naŋgalaŋmane neŋ gâlen mânep ilindiŋ ŋep gawap!’
40018030	Dundum same kembeŋ ku mti notnaŋ mka katikŋanen pemti zeye, ‘Geŋ dopmaŋ mutu namaneŋgut belak geme kwewebanik.’
40018031	Kegok sokbeme mulup an notnaneyaŋ ekti keŋin bekanaŋ beme amobotnaŋmagen meti zapat ke msawien.
40018032	Msame amobotnaŋaŋ nâmti sisiliŋ an zeme kopme dunduye, ‘Geŋ keŋ katik penaŋ. Geŋ zekâkât mnamane neŋ gâgât kembeŋ nâmti sewakŋaŋ mgema geŋ dopmaŋ ku nawanan.
40018033	Âpme neŋ dopmaŋdi katikpema geŋ kwilekiyet nodaŋgat kembeŋ ku mbanan?’
40018034	Kegok zemti an ke ŋenzinziŋ omba msamti mka katikŋan pemti damuŋ ekŋengat pigok zemindeye, ‘In an kapi damuŋ mti sek sindem omba masamotnepeme nâlen mânep dopmaŋ mutum delaŋ zeme kwalet pewep.’ “
40018035	Ke zemti Zisasiyaŋ bemzenze zet ke zemdelaŋ zemti yaŋaŋ kapigok zeye, “In nolineyelen yom keŋinan penaŋ ku katikpeme kululuŋ Biwinaŋ ingalen kegok ku katikpewe.”
40019001	Âpme Zisasiyaŋ zet yaŋaŋ yaŋaŋ zemdelaŋ zemti egaŋ Galili msat katipemti Zudia msalen Zodan tu nembet mepme
40019002	am maŋge temaŋ mâti mepme zawatmak ekŋen weyaŋindeye.
40019003	Mme Palisi ekŋenaŋ ek tetipeme ekŋengalen tetimaemaeyelen toweme eksâgât koti yaŋkwesiwien, “Kawawaŋgalen zii zelaŋ anaŋ imbiŋaŋ kwitnaŋ kwitnaŋ sambe myuŋgume asekpepeyelen zein, ma yek?”
40019004	Kegok yaŋkwesime Zisasiyaŋ kapigok diindoye, “In Kawawaŋgalen Zet Itnaŋaŋen ku mamakuip, ma? Ke kapigok kumpepeŋaŋ, ‘Kawawaŋaŋ yaŋbembeŋaŋ baen an ma imbi weyaŋideye’. (Sokbembe 1:27)
40019005	Weyaŋidemti kapigok zeye, ‘An ŋen ek mamaŋ bipmaŋ katim idemti imbiŋaŋmak tusumti eget kwepnok bewalup.’ (Sokbembe 2:24)
40019006	Keyepm eget ewe zut yek; kwepnok talup. Kawawaŋaŋ temakwep tusumidein keyepm amnaŋ it kalaŋidendeyelen yek.”
40019007	Zisasiyaŋ kegok zeme Palisi ekŋenaŋ pigok yaŋkwesiwien, “Âpme kwilekiyet mti Mosesiyaŋ zii zelen an ŋenaŋ imbiŋaŋ asekpepeyelen meluwaŋ kumsamti peme mebegalen nâmindeye?”
40019008	Kegok yaŋkwesime Zisasiyaŋ zeye, “In keŋ katik mamti Kawawaŋgalen zetnaŋ ku mamâlip ma in imbiŋin asekpepeyelen manâip keyepm Mosesiyaŋ ke zeye. Yaŋbembeŋaŋ baen set kegok ku tage.
40019009	Keyepm neŋ diindoma nâit, An ŋenaŋ imbiŋaŋ kwitnaŋ kwitnaŋ bekanaŋ ku mme nâmbemti imbiŋaŋ asekpewe beme keyaŋ yom. Âk imbiŋaŋaŋ set kileŋ mame apmaŋaŋ asekpewe beme keyaŋ ŋep bewe.” Âk anaŋ imbiŋaŋaŋ kegok ku mme egaŋ imbiŋaŋ ŋen wabe beme ek set kileŋ anok bewe.
40019010	Zeme nembaŋane nin nâmti pigok zewenn, “Awembiŋ mamayelen kegok bein beme imbi wawapiŋ mama keyaŋ ŋep bein.”
40019011	Zemann Zisasiyaŋ kapigok dinndoye, “Zet ke am ilindiŋ ekŋengalen zapat yek. An kwep kwep Kawawaŋaŋ indamukulem mim ekŋengat zapaletaŋ.
40019012	Anaŋ imbi wawapiŋ belak maip ke yaŋaŋ tuk kapigok: Notnaŋ ekŋen keŋin mamkeŋ kegok masokbeip ma notnaŋ amnaŋ sekŋin butnaŋ walet indendeŋaŋ awembiŋ bembeyelen tikŋaŋ ku nâip ma notnaŋ keŋ sekŋin Kawawaŋgalen mulup mimiyet nâmti awembiŋ ku mambep. An ŋenaŋ mama mimi delaŋ zenzeŋaŋ kapi mâsât mbe beme ŋep mâbe.”
40019013	Âpme an imbi ekŋenaŋ nemunambaŋine isisikŋaŋ Zisasmagen indatim kopme egaŋ betnaŋaŋ sekŋinan bemti dundum indendeyet ilinak zenâwien. Zemeŋgut nembaŋane nin am ekŋen zemkulumindewann.
40019014	Kegok mmann Zisasiyaŋ, “Nemba indeme neŋmagen kolit. In ku zemkulumindeit,” kegok zeye. “Am ekŋen nemba isikŋaŋ keboŋ ekŋen Kawawaŋgalen zemâtâtâtgat katnan mama keyet kandaŋan mamaip.”
40019015	Kegok zemti betnaŋ sekŋinanen belaŋ atamti dundum indemti mege.
40019016	Msat ke pemti mepmann an zomolim ŋenaŋ Zisasmagen koti yaŋkwesiye, “An zikat indanda, neŋ mulup dolakŋaŋ ŋen ziboŋ mti mama kanzizitgat zapat bewap?”
40019017	Kegok zeme Zisasiyaŋ kapigok dunduye, “Kwitnaŋ kwitnaŋ dolakŋaŋgat eneyet tatnayaŋkwesinik? Msalen kapi an dolakŋaŋ ŋen ku tazin. Kawawaŋ kwewetaŋ an dolakŋaŋ. Âpme geŋ mama kanzizitgat zapat besâgât mbanik beme zii zet gawepumane delaŋ zemâbe.”
40019018	Zeme an keyaŋ zeye, “Zii zet ziboŋ?” Ke zemti yaŋkwesime Zisasiyaŋ zeye, “Geŋ kasa kumti am ku kumane gakiwe, awembiŋ kalalaŋ ku mbalup, kambu ku mbanik, ma am ŋengat sekŋan dâsuki bem zenzepiŋ.
40019019	Geŋ mambipdi eksemidewanik. Mti gitangat gogot mamnik sepem kegogak amgat gogot mbanik.”
40019020	Zeme an zomolim keyaŋ kapigok dunduye, “Ke zenigen ke elak gawepumti mamiap yaŋgut ŋen ewe zigok mbap?”
40019021	Kegok zeme Zisasiyaŋ dunduye, “Geŋ teŋ penaŋ mamasât nâwanik ma mama kanzizit ke tisâgât nâwanik beme met milawadi bemane kwitime keyetnaŋ mânep ke kalaŋ kumti am bekopsat indamâbanik. Kegok mbanik beme kululuŋen gwaen kwitnaŋ kwitnaŋ dolakŋaŋ geŋ tiwanik. Kegok mti neŋmak tusumti namâbanik.”
40019022	Zeme an zomolimaŋ mânep milawatnaŋ temaŋ tage keyepmti keŋaŋ beme zetnepiŋ mege.
40019023	Mepme Zisasiyaŋ nembaŋane nin kapigok dinndoye, “Neŋ penaŋ zema nâit, am mânep milawalin temaŋ ekŋenmagen Kawawaŋgalen zemâtâtâtgat katnan mama keyet keŋan mebegalen olalatnaŋmak bewe.
40019024	Bo temaŋaŋ buŋi aimboŋaŋ isikŋanen ŋep ku modak. Sepem kegogak am mânep milawalinmak ekŋenaŋ Kawawaŋgalen zemâtâtâtgat katnanen mama keyet keŋan mobogalen pepepeŋaŋ omba penaŋ tazin.”
40019025	Kegok zeme nembaŋane nin zet ke nâmann nukŋaŋ penaŋ beme zewenn, “Kegok beme kwiyaŋ mama kanzizit ŋep tiwe?”
40019026	Zemann Zisasiyaŋ zimosetnanen ndik mototi zeye, “Mânep milawalaŋ set bekekme amnaŋ Kawawaŋgalen zemâtâtâtgat katnan mama keyet keŋan ku mebep yaŋgut Kawawaŋaŋ amgat keŋin mme eleŋ belaŋ beme mama kanzizit ke ŋep tiwep.”
40019027	Kegok dinndome Pitayaŋ sakwep penaŋ pigok zeye, “Nânik, nin kwitnaŋ kwitnaŋ sambe pemann tapme geŋ gapmâbenn keyepm maneti keyet dopmaŋ Kawawaŋaŋ kwileki penaŋ ndawe?”
40019028	Kegok yaŋkwesime Zisasiyaŋ kapigok dinndoye, “Neŋ penaŋ sukwep diindowi. Maneti bamgat kwitnaŋ kwitnaŋ alakŋaŋ sokbemâbe kan keyet neŋ Angat Nemuŋaŋ Amobotnaŋgalen mundum windemak keyet totapma in kegogak mundum 12 keyet totati Islael maŋge 12 ekŋengat damuŋine tabep.
40019029	Ma am ŋenaŋ nâgât mti dapmeniŋene ipbialine ma mambiwine ma nemunambaŋine ma mkaŋin ma muluwin yaloŋti kobepgapm ekŋen keyet dopmaŋ omba penaŋ indayap ma bamgat mama kanzizit tiwep.
40019030	An ŋenaŋ ikŋaŋgat sekŋaŋ alak pigogat mmoti, ‘Neŋ ŋep talap,’ tazein beme egaŋ bamgat tototnaŋ bewe. Ma ŋenaŋ alak tototnaŋ tapmain beme egaŋ bamgat mobotnaŋ bewe.
40020001	Kawawaŋgalen zemâtâtâtgat katnan mama keyet yaŋaŋ pigok, mse ŋengat an ŋenaŋ tambuŋan penaŋ an indatime wain mulupman mimiyelen mebien.
40020002	Egaŋ mulup mimiyelen tosa sepem kwep kina kwep kina kwep kegok indandayelen zetik mimindeme ekŋenaŋ, ‘Ŋep,’ zeme wain mulupmanen indatime mebien.
40020003	Meti tapmme 9 kilok beme an maŋge notnaŋ belak tabien ekŋenmagen meti diindoye,
40020004	‘In kogogak kopme nâlen wain muluwen met indema mulup mme tosaŋaŋ ŋep indasap.’
40020005	Kegok zeme ilinsakwep wain muluwen ke mebien. Âpme 12 kilok beme sepem ewe kegogak mge. Mme 3 kilok beme ewe kegogak notnaŋ indatiye.
40020006	Ma 5 kilok beme ewe meti an notnaŋ mulup mimipiŋ tapme indikti diindoye, ‘In kwilekiyet kasup teepmaŋ pi belak tatnepeme msat gasim bein?’
40020007	Zeme ekŋenaŋ zewien, ‘An ŋenaŋ mulup ke mseip ke nin ku zemndep.’ Zeme egaŋ diindoye, ‘Kopme nâlen wain muluwen meindema mulup mit.’
40020008	Ke tapme mulup tosaŋaŋ indandayelen damuŋ zempemti zeye, ‘Geŋ mulup an zemane kopmâpme mânep inda. An bam kolo ekŋen kukŋaŋgat indamti an ŋeŋaŋ kolo ekŋen bam indasenik.’
40020009	Kegok zempeme an mulup 5 kilokgat yaŋbemti mbien ekŋen mânep kina kwep kina kwep indaye.
40020010	Taindame ŋeŋaŋ kobien ekŋenaŋ ekti, ‘Nin mânep mmoti ndasâpm,’ nâmti tatnepeme damuŋ egaŋ kina kwep kina kwep ekŋen kwep kwep indam mege.
40020011	Mânep kegok indame ekŋenaŋ mulup toŋaŋgat ŋenzinziŋ msawien.
40020012	Mti zewien, ‘An bam kolo ekŋenaŋ mulup belak kan isikŋaŋ bugan miyo. Âpme nin kasup katikŋaŋ penaŋ muluwen sek sindem palen tatnepemann msat gasim beme kwilekiyet bam kolo ekŋenmak mânep sepem kwep ndanik?’
40020013	Kegok zeme mulup toŋaŋaŋ ekŋenmagen kwep pigok dunduye, ‘Notn, geŋ ku tetiŋgeyap. Geŋ mânep kina kwepgat zema nâmane ŋep bep
40020014	keyepm mânepdi mti met. Neŋ am bam kolo ekŋenmak geŋmak mânep sepem kwep indandayet nâma ŋep bep.
40020015	Mânep nenaŋgalen ya neŋ zigok ma zigok msâgât mbak beme nâyap kataŋ mbak. Neŋ keŋ taolet mgama geŋ nâmbekananik, ma?’”
40020016	Âpme Zisasiyaŋ bemzenze zet ke zemdelaŋ zemti pigok zeye, “An ŋenaŋ Kawawaŋgalen zemâtâtât katnanen mama keyet keŋan ŋeŋaŋ mebe ma ŋenaŋ bam mebe keyaŋgut Kawawaŋaŋ eget ilizuzut mama kanzizit itdawe.”
40020017	Âpme Zisasiyaŋ Zelusalem mkaen mosât moti set ganzenaset nembaŋane nin 12 ndatime mepmambe kapigok dinndoye,
40020018	“Nâip, nin alak Zelusalem mkaen tapmetnup. Ya neŋ Angat Nemuŋaŋ sâpe sâpe bumbu an ŋeŋaŋ ekŋenaŋ ma zii zet zikat indanda ekŋengalen belen mopma ekŋenaŋ nome gakikiyet zemdelaŋ zewep.
40020019	Âpme keyet palaŋan kasanne ekŋenaŋ Loma ekŋengalen gapman ekŋengat belinan neme mopma ekŋenaŋ pep zet mnamti sindiwaŋ nawetikti nome gakiwap. Yaŋgut kasup tuk delaŋ peme gakikiengatnaŋ gilik zem wati mamaen mobap.”
40020020	Kan keyet Zân ma Zems Zebediyet nemulatnenetgat mamidaŋ idatimti Zisasiyet kandaŋan koti pedondom samti nâmitdendeyelen dundum saye.
40020021	Kegok mme Zisasiyaŋ yaŋkwesiye, “Geŋ neŋ kwileki mgaŋgayelen gembein?” Zeme egaŋ zeye, “Geŋ zemkatik bemnamane nemun zut kapiyaŋ geŋ amobotnaŋ temaŋ tabanik kan keyet ŋenaŋ bedi penaset ma bedi alomset amobotnaŋ gitaŋgat kandaŋdan tabalup.”
40020022	Kegok zeme Zisasiyaŋ indayaŋkwesiye, “In ku nâmti kegok yaŋkwesip. It neŋ sindem tiwap ke it ŋep tiwalup?” Zeme egelaŋ zewun, “E ŋep tiwalup.”
40020023	Kegok zemalu Zisasiyaŋ zeye, “Neŋ sindem tiwap ke it penaŋ tiwalup yaŋgut nâlen betn penaset kwiyaŋ tatatgalen ma betn alomset tabe ke neŋ ŋep ku zenzeyelen. Mundum ekseseŋaŋmak ke Bienaŋ an kwi makumindeye ekŋengalen zapat tazin.”
40020024	Kegok mme nemuŋane 10 nin keyet zapat nâmti egegat ŋenzinziŋ mbenn.
40020025	Mmann Zisasiyaŋ nin ilindiŋ zeme kopmann dinndoye, “In nâip msalengalen amobotnaŋ ekŋen winde omba taindame zet windeŋaŋbeŋ msat palen am ekŋengat manzeip.
40020026	Set keboŋ ke ingat tuŋguwinan ŋen ku tabe. Keyepmti inmagengatnaŋ an ŋenaŋ amobotnaŋ besât nâin beme egaŋ in sambeyelen sisiliŋ an bewe.
40020027	Ma inmagengatnaŋ an ŋenaŋ amobotnaŋ Kawawaŋgat zikatnan besât nâwe beme egaŋ sisiliŋ nemba etaŋ kwati toŋaŋgat mulup etaŋ mpeme tosaŋaŋ ku masain keboŋ mamambe.
40020028	Sepem kegogak neŋ Angat Nemuŋaŋ amnaŋ sisiliŋ mnanayelen ku koban yek. Neŋ am ekŋengat sisiliŋ mulup mimindandayelen koban ma am ekŋen nanaŋgat maman ketalasima amnaŋ mama kanzizit aiikgat nâmti gakikiyet toban.”
40020029	Âpme Zisas ma nemuŋane nin Zeliko msat pemti tapmepmann am maŋge temaŋaŋ ndamâti mebien.
40020030	Keyegak an zut zikalit beŋaŋaŋ set ganzenaŋ tapmambun, “Ya Zisas kwawezin,” zeme nâmti kwizet temaŋ kumti zewun, “Amobotnaŋ, geŋ Dewitgat alikŋaŋ, nigat kembeŋ mi!”
40020031	Kegok zemalut amnaŋ eget zemkulumidemti buzak tatagalen diitdowien. Keyaŋgut egelaŋ ewe giŋgiŋ mti kwizet omba kuwun, “Amobotnaŋ, Dewitgalen alikŋaŋ, geŋ nigat kembeŋ mi!”
40020032	Kegok zemalut Zisasiyaŋ metati idayaŋkwesiye, “It neŋ zigok mimidandayelen nâlup?”
40020033	Kegok zeme egelaŋ zuwun, “Amobotnaŋ, nit eekgalen nâlup.”
40020034	Kegok zemalut Zisasiyaŋ egegat kembeŋ mti zikalit taŋgume keyegak zikalit ekti ekmak mebun.
40021001	Âpme Zisas ma nembaŋane nin Zelusalem pataŋ zesât mti Betpage mkaen ke tati nembaŋanet zut kukŋaŋgat
40021002	pigok zemideye, “It ŋeŋaŋ mkaen met pataŋ pepeŋak doŋki ŋen tegaŋ opemti tepum palen opepeŋaŋ nembaŋaŋ isikŋaŋ ganzenan tapme ekselup. Ke kwaleti idatetimti neŋmagen koselup.
40021003	Kegok mmalut am ŋenaŋ zigok ŋen zeme, it pigok dunduselup, ‘Amobotnaŋaŋ kapiyet mulupmaŋ sasayelen zemndeme kolup.’ Kegok zemalut egaŋ keyegak nâmideme mkoselup.”
40021004	Ke sokbeye ke eweŋan baenen golaŋ zenze an ŋenaŋ zet meluwaŋ kapi mge keyet kataŋ sokbemkawaŋ bein:
40021005	“Zaion mka temaŋgalen am diindo, ‘Egit, ingalen Amobotnaŋin ek inmagen kozin! Keŋ sewakŋaŋ toŋaŋ. Doŋki nembaŋaŋ isikŋaŋ milawat matin keyet dukŋan kozin.’” (Zekaraia 9:9)
40021006	Zeme nemba zulaŋ nâmti Zisasiyaŋ diitdoyenok met
40021007	doŋki mam nemba idatetimti koti nin melakandundun sakŋaŋgatnaŋ gulumti doŋki egegat palen yeŋgepemann Zisasiyaŋ palaŋan mototage.
40021008	Âpme am maŋge temaŋaŋ egat set miakpepeyelen melakanduŋin timti selen yeŋgewien. Ma notnaŋaŋ niwet sinaŋ atumti selen yeŋgewien.
40021009	Kegok mme am maŋge temaŋaŋ kalaŋti Zisasiyet ŋeŋaŋ ma baman meti kwizet kapigok kuwien, “Dewitgalen alikŋaŋ, nin sesewatgenup! Kawawaŋaŋ gaombem geŋgeŋaŋ kotnik keyet oloŋen penaŋ mti Kawawaŋ sesewatpene!” (Sam 118:25-27)
40021010	Kegok mme Zisasiyaŋ Zelusalem mka temaŋ keŋan mopme am mka mtoŋaŋ kwisak ke nâmti keŋin wapme yaŋkwesiwien, “An ke kwiyaŋ kozin?”
40021011	Kegok yaŋkwesime am maŋge temaŋaŋ zewien, “Kapi Zisas. Ek golaŋ zenze an Nasalet Galili mkaengatnaŋaŋ kozin.”
40021012	-
40021013	Ke moti Zisasiyaŋ sesewat mka temaŋ keŋan moti ekme amnaŋ makau ma sipsip sâpe sâpe bumbuyelen aem kwaem tapmambien. Mânep aem kwaem tapm mambiengalen mundumaŋ mgilik zeye ma sasakandenombe takwitimambien ekŋengalen mundum kegogak mgilik zemti diindoye, “Kawawaŋgalen Zet Itnaŋaŋen Kawawaŋaŋ pigok zeme meluwaŋ mimiŋaŋ, ‘Nâlen sesewat mka ke dundundu mka’ (Aizaya 56:7) keyaŋgut in mme an kambu titi ekŋengalen enzilili mka tabein.” (Zelemaia 7:11) Kegok zemti am ekŋen ke zemindemti indamâpme toti kwawebien.
40021014	Mme am zikalin beŋaŋ ma wesiŋ ekŋenaŋ sesewat mka temanen kopme weyaŋindeye.
40021015	Ke tapmme nemba isisik ekŋenaŋ, “Dewitgalen alikŋaŋ, sesewatpene!” kwizet kegok kupeŋ keŋan mowepme sâpe sâpe bumbu an ekŋen ma zii zet zikat indanda ekŋenaŋ muluwaŋ mamanamaŋ ke ekti keyet ŋenzinziŋ penaŋ mti
40021016	Zisas yaŋkwesiwien, “Geŋ ekŋenaŋ kwileki tazep ke tatnânik?” Zeme Zisasiyaŋ diindoye, “Âk neŋ ŋep tatnâyap. In Kawawaŋgalen Zet Itnaŋaŋ ku mamakuip, ma? Ke kapigok kumpepeŋaŋ, ‘Geŋ nemba isisik ma nemba okak zikat indamane ekŋenaŋ gâgât sesewatgawep.’ “ (Sam 8:2)
40021017	Kegok mti Zisasiyaŋ ekŋen katiindemti Betani mkaen tambumbu kwep mepmaŋge.
40021018	Âpme tambuŋan penaŋ Zisasiyaŋ mka teman gilik zem kwakwagalen kwati meuyet mge.
40021019	Mti ekme set ganzenaset pik tep tapme ekti katnaŋ niniyelen yayaŋ mge yaŋgut katnaŋ niniyelen ŋen tatapiŋ; sinaŋ etaŋ tage. Kegok ekti tepgat zeye, “Geŋ kadi ŋen ku elikbanik yek penaŋ.” Zeme keyegak tewaŋ memuŋ beye.
40021020	Kegok sokbeme nembaŋane nin ekti pisemti yaŋkwesiwenn, “Zigogapm tep ke sakwep penaŋ memuŋ bep?”
40021021	Kegok zemann Zisasiyaŋ pigok zeye, “Neŋ penaŋ sukwep diindowi, in keŋ zutmak ku mamti Kawawaŋgat nâmkiŋpewep beme in neŋ miyap sepem keboŋ mbep. Mti ke etaŋ yek, in nukŋaŋ kalaŋ nemboŋ keyet pigok zemsawep, ‘Nembu keŋan metot,’ zeme kegok mbe.
40021022	Ma in nâmkiŋpewep beme ke ma ke mimiyet dundum same egaŋ ŋep mbe.”
40021023	Zisas ek sesewat mka temanen gilik zem meti am zet zapat dolakŋaŋ tapm zikat indame sâpe sâpe bumbu an ŋeŋaŋ ma sesewat mka temaŋ keyelen an damuŋ ekŋenaŋ koti pigok yaŋkwesiwien, “An kwiyaŋ nâmgeme am sesewat mka temanen ke indamâbanan?”
40021024	Kegok yaŋkwesime Zisasiyaŋ pigok zeye, “Neŋ yaŋkwesisi kwep penaŋ indayaŋkwesima, in dopmaŋ teŋ gilik zem nameŋgut neŋ an kwiyaŋ nâmneme mamiyap ke diindosap.”
40021025	Kegok zemti zeye, “Zân tu zulutindende an ek am tu zulutindendeyelen an kwiyaŋ mulup ke saye? Kawawaŋaŋ nâmpeye ma amnaŋ nâmpewien?” Kegok zeme ekŋenaŋ ilinak zenâ zenâ mti zewien, “Nin zigok zesenup? ‘Kawawaŋmagengatnaŋ,’ zesenup beme egaŋ zet dopmaŋ pigok zesem, ‘Ya kok ke kwilekiyet mti ku nâmkiŋpewien?’
40021026	Ma ‘Ammagengatnaŋ,’ zesenup ke nin am ekŋengat kiŋganup kelak yaŋaŋ am ekŋenaŋ Zân ek golaŋ zenze an penaŋ kegok nâmkatik bewien.”
40021027	Zemti Zisasiyet pigok zewien, “Nin ku nânup.” Kegok zeme Zisasiyaŋ ekŋengat zeye, “Neŋ kegogak an kwiyaŋ zemneme mamiyap ke ku diindosap.”
40021028	Ke zemti zeye, “In zigok nâip? An ŋen ek nemuŋanet ayumuŋ mambuk. Egaŋ nemuŋaŋ yumagen meti zenak, ‘Nemun, geŋ alak wain muluwen mulup msenik.’
40021029	Zeme nemuŋaŋ yuyaŋ zenak, ‘Yek, neŋ ku msap.’ Kegok zenak yaŋgut keŋaŋ gilik zeme naman muluwen medak.
40021030	Biwitdaŋ nemuŋaŋ yuyet sepem kogok dunduye âpme nemuŋaŋ muŋaŋ zeye, ‘Neŋ ŋep msap.’ Kegok zeye yaŋgut ku mge.
40021031	Âpme nemuŋanet egetmagengatnaŋ kwiyaŋ biwitdaŋ nâŋgenok mge?” Kegok zeme sâpe sâpe bumbu an ma sesewat mka temaŋgalen an damuŋ ekŋenaŋ zewien, “Nemuŋaŋ yu.” Zeme Zisasiyaŋ zeye, “Neŋ penaŋ diindowi, mme takis mânep titi ma set kileŋ imbi ekŋenaŋ ŋeŋaŋ bemti Kawawaŋgalen zemâtâtâtgat katnanen mama keyet kandaŋan tapmelip. Âpme in keŋan ku talip.
40021032	Zân tu zulutindende an egaŋ set teŋ zikat indame mâbâgalen ekmâtâbien yaŋgut in ku nâmkiŋpewien. Âpme takis mânep titi an ma set kileŋ imbi ekŋenaŋ nâmkiŋpewien. Ekŋenaŋ kegok mme in ekbien yaŋgut in yominaŋgatnan keŋin gilik zeme ku nâmkiŋpewien.”
40021033	Ke zemti egaŋ sesewat mka temaŋgalen an damuŋ ma sâpe sâpe bumbu an ekŋengat zeye, “Wak bemti bemzenze zet ŋen zesowapgat ewe nâit. Kan ŋengat msat toŋaŋaŋ wain alikŋaŋ msatnaŋen ke onzeye. Mti kimbat kunduŋ kindiŋ bempemti wain katnaŋ misiksikgalen msat walatopemti amnaŋ mulup kalem tati eekgalen mka teepmaŋ walatpeye. Kegok mpemti wain mulupmaŋ ke kalop bemti amnaŋ ekdamuŋ mti mamayet toŋaŋ toŋaŋ indamti msat pem ŋen mege.
40021034	Egaŋ ke meti manepeme wain katnaŋ mâtâtâtgalen kanaŋ beme mulup anene zemindeme wain damuŋ ekŋenmagen wain katnaŋ titiyelen kobien.
40021035	Zemindeme kopme wain damuŋ ekŋenaŋ mulup an indatetimti kwep sidiwaŋ witikbien ma ŋen kume gakiye ma ŋen nanzaŋaŋ kuwien.
40021036	Kegok mme msat toŋaŋaŋ zapat ke nâmti mulup an ewe sambe indeme kukŋaŋgat kobien ekŋen aindaŋgosomti omba penaŋ indeme kobien. Kopme wain damuŋ ekŋenaŋ ewe kukŋaŋgat mimindawien sepem kegogak mbien.
40021037	Kegok mme bam delaŋ zenzeŋan ikŋaŋgat nemuŋaŋ penaŋ peme ekŋenmagen mesâgât mme keŋanen kapigok nâŋge, ‘Penaŋ sukwep pi ekŋenaŋ nemun eksempeseip.’
40021038	Kegok otnâye yaŋgut wain damuŋ ekŋenaŋ nemuŋaŋ ke ekti ilinak pigok zenâwien, ‘Pi ikŋaŋgat nemuŋaŋ penaŋ kapiyaŋ toŋaŋ bewe keyet kopme nin kumann gakime kwilekiki sambe kapi ningat zapat bek.’
40021039	Kegok zemti ekŋenaŋ nemuŋaŋ ke atamti mandamti mulup paselen tot kume gakiye.”
40021040	Kegok zemti Zisasiyaŋ indayaŋkwesiye, “Msat toŋaŋaŋ wain mulupmanen kosâpm ke wain damuŋ ekŋen zigok penaŋ mimindasâpm?”
40021041	Kegok zeme ekŋenaŋ zewien, “Egaŋ penaŋ sukwep am keŋ katik ekŋen ke indome gakime wain muluwen wain damuŋ alakŋaŋ indeme ekdamuŋ mti katnaŋ titi kananen timti toŋaŋgat maŋge butnaŋ sawep.”
40021042	Ekŋenaŋ kegok zeme Zisasiyaŋ kapigok diindoye, “Kawawaŋgalen Zet Itnaŋanen zet ŋen kapigok tazin ke in ku mamaiŋ nâip, ma? ‘Mka walalat ekŋenaŋ tepum ŋen ekme bekanaŋ beme wisat mti peme weŋge. Tepum kewan tepum miŋaŋ beye. Sepem kegok ke Amobotnaŋ Kawawaŋaŋ mme nin ekmann ego egoŋaŋmak mambein.’ (Sam 118:22-23)
40021043	Keyet zema nâit, Kawawaŋgalen zemâtâtâtgat katnanen mama ke in Zuda maŋgeen sokbembeyet zenzeŋaŋ ke inmagen menzem mti naman am belakŋaŋ ŋen indame ekŋenaŋ mme penaŋaŋ elikbe.
40021044	Amnaŋ, ‘Tepum ke sambuŋaŋ,’ zewien yaŋgut tepum ke kaliŋaŋ ya an keyet palen tokutun beme an ke epeewe. Ma tepum keyaŋ am keyet palen tokutun beme am ke gakime sekŋaŋ kânzunzuyaŋ bemisikbe.”
40021045	Bemzenze zet zut ke zeme sâpe sâpe bumbu an ma Palisi ekŋenaŋ keyet yaŋaŋ nâmâtâti zewien, “Wakae, an pi ningat tazein.”
40021046	Kegok zemti atamti mka katikŋan pepeyelen nâwien yaŋgut amnaŋ Zisasiyet golaŋ zenze an manzemtemiengapm kiŋgati peme tage.
40022001	Âpme Zisasiyaŋ ewe bemzenzeeset am zet kapigok diindoye,
40022002	“Kawawaŋgalen zemâtâtâtgat katnanen mama keyet yaŋaŋ kapigok. Kan ŋengat amobotnaŋgat nemuŋaŋ ŋenaŋ imbiŋaŋmak bet mututuyelen tu meu weyaŋ bemti
40022003	mulup anne indeme am kukŋaŋgat indamandandaŋaŋ zeme kokogalen diindowien yaŋgut kokogalen ku indembeye.
40022004	Kegok mme amobotnaŋaŋ mulup anene notnaŋ zemindeme am indamandandaŋaŋ ekŋengat zeye, ‘Nâlen bulmakau ma makau nembaŋaŋ temaŋ temaŋ kumti aŋo ma kwitnaŋ kwitnaŋ sambe ilak weyaŋo keyet awembiŋgalen meu niniyelen kolit.’
40022005	Kegok zeye yaŋgut am indamandadaŋaŋ ekŋenaŋ nâmpemambe ilinaŋgat tikŋaŋin nâwiengat kataŋ mepmâbien. Kwewaŋ ikŋaŋgat mulupman mege; ŋenaŋ aem kwaem mkaen mege.
40022006	Kegok mme am notnaŋaŋ mulup annaŋ indatamti indome gakiwien.
40022007	Kegok mme amobotnaŋaŋ ŋeŋaŋ penaŋ zime kasa kuku anne zemindeme am mulup anene indowienen ekŋen indome gakime mkaŋin temaŋ tep bume ziye.
40022008	Kegok mti mulup anne diindoye, ‘Nâlen tu meu kelak weyayaŋaŋ tazin ekŋengat zapat yek.
40022009	Keyepmti am alakŋaŋ set teman meti am omba indaikseip ke indatim koseip.’
40022010	Kegok zemindeme mulup anene ekŋenaŋ set teman meti am sambe indaikbien am pembenaŋ ma am bekanaŋ kwaweti mka bemisik tabien.
40022011	Kegok mme amobotnaŋaŋ am indamukukuyelen moti ekme an ŋen ondedakgalen sâk melakandu sasaŋaŋ ke ku miak tapme ege.
40022012	Ekti zeye, ‘Notn, geŋ keŋan pi zigoset ondedak sâk melakandu miayakpiŋ kwatnek?’ Amobotnaŋaŋ kegok yaŋkwesime an keyaŋ zetpiŋ tage.
40022013	Kegok mme amobotnaŋaŋ mulup anne diindoye, ‘Setnaŋ betnaŋ zamti zupman tambusosok keŋan peme towelak. Ke mamti sek sindem timti zetnaŋ aŋgalikme masumambe.’ “
40022014	Zisasiyaŋ kegok zemti pigok zemdelaŋ zeye, “Kawawaŋaŋ am sambe indamandandaŋaŋ yaŋgut kwep kwewaŋ mebep.”
40022015	Zisasiyaŋ kegok zeme Palisi notnaŋ ekŋenaŋ buzak metati Zisas tetipemti zemkukuyelen zenâ zenâ mbien.
40022016	Mti nembaŋine ma Elotgalen an notnaŋ zemindeme meti kapigok yaŋkwesiwien, “An zikat indanda, nin gâgât yaŋdi nânup. Geŋ zet dâsuki zenzepiŋ; penaŋak etaŋ manzenik. Ma zapat dolakŋaŋgalen zet ke am mobotnaŋ ma tototnaŋ sepem kwep manzikat ndanik.
40022017	Keyepmti geŋ zemane nâne. Gâlen nânâyaŋ zigok nânik? Amobotnaŋ Sisamagen takis mânep ŋep bembeyelen ma yek?”
40022018	Kegok zeme egaŋ ekŋengalen nânâ bekanaŋ ke ekmâtâti diindoye, “In an zetgalen etaŋ! In kwilekiyet neŋ tatetineip?”
40022019	Kegok zemti zeye, “In takis mânep mambeip ke ŋen zikat name ekbi.” Kegok zeme ekŋenaŋ mânep same ege.
40022020	Ekti kapigok indayaŋkwesiye, “Am weŋaŋ ma kwit kapi kwiyelen?”
40022021	Zeme ekŋenaŋ zewien, “Ke amobotnaŋ Sisayelen.” Kegok zeme egaŋ diindoye, “Nâip, Sisayelen weŋaŋaŋ tatatnaŋ ke Sisa ikŋaŋ sawep. Âpme Kawawaŋ ikŋaŋgalen bet meluwaŋ keyepmti in ikŋaŋgat zapat mait.”
40022022	Ekŋenaŋ ke zeme nâmti nâmtemtem mti pemti mebien.
40022023	Kasup mulup mimi keyet Sadusi ekŋenaŋ Zisasmagen kobien. Ekŋengalen nânâyaŋ am gakiwep ke ku wabep manâip keyepmti Zisas keyet yaŋkwesiwien,
40022024	“An zikat indanda, Mosesiyaŋ kapigok zenzeŋaŋ, ‘An ŋenaŋ nemunambaŋaŋpiŋ gakin beme notnaŋ isikŋaŋaŋ imbi kwambet ke wati nemunamba egaŋ msokbewe keyaŋ an kukŋaŋgatnaŋ keyelen sip butnaŋ bewep.’ “
40022025	Kegok zemti ewe zewien, “Âpme an ŋenaŋ nembaŋane 7 indabege. Ya maneti ayuyaŋ imbi wati nembapiŋ gakime muŋaŋaŋ imbi kwambet ke wage.
40022026	Ya muŋaŋ nembapiŋ gakime gwatnaŋaŋ kwambelin ke wage. Sepem kegogak ekŋen sambemagen sokbeme nemunambaŋinpiŋ gakiwien.
40022027	Ya bam imbi kwambelin keyaŋ yek beye.
40022028	Ya wawat kanaŋ an kwiyaŋ imbi ke mkipmaŋ beme egat imbiŋaŋ bewe?”
40022029	Ke tetipemti kegok zeme Zisasiyaŋ zeye, “In Kawawaŋgalen Zetnaŋ Itnaŋaŋ ma egalen winde keyet kandati keyepm zet manzemyuŋguip.
40022030	Wawat kanen awembiŋ mama ke ewe ku mambep. Ekŋenaŋ ensel kululuŋengatnaŋ nemboŋ bemti tabep.
40022031	Yaŋgut in gakikiengatnaŋ wawat keyet manâmyuŋguipgat diindowi; Kawawaŋgalen Zet Itnaŋanen zet kapigok zenzeŋaŋ ke in ku mamaiŋ nâip, ma?
40022032	Kawawaŋaŋ kapigok zeye, ‘Neŋ Abalaam ma Aisak ma Zekop ekŋengalen Kawawaŋin.’ (Kisim Bek 3:6) Wa ek am gakikiŋaŋgalen Kawawaŋ yek. Egaŋ am mama kanzizitgat zapat ombemindeye ekŋengalen Kawawaŋ.”
40022033	Kegok zeme am maŋge temaŋ ekŋenaŋ egalen mzikat indanda keyet nâmtemtem mbien.
40022034	Zisasiyelen zelaŋ Sadusi ekŋengalen windeŋin mtoindeme Palisi an ekŋenaŋ nâmbien. Keyepm ekŋenaŋ ilinak ondekti
40022035	ekŋenmagengatnaŋ ŋen zii zet zikat indanda keyaŋ Zisas yaŋkwesisien tetipeye,
40022036	“An zikat indanda, zii zet kwilekiyaŋ mobotnaŋ penaŋ bein?”
40022037	Zeme Zisasiyaŋ dunduye, “‘Geŋ keŋdi ma nâmamandi ma windendi ma ŋoktikdi ekŋen ke ketalasimti Amobotnaŋ Kawawaŋgat etaŋ gogot mpewanik.’ (Zii Zet 6:5)
40022038	Zet keyaŋ zii zet ŋotekŋaŋ ma zet mobotnaŋ penaŋ bein.
40022039	Ma ŋen ewe sakam kapigok, ‘Gitaŋgat keŋdi mambeinok amgat kegogak gogot mbanik.’ (Wok Pris 19:18)
40022040	zii zet ma golaŋ zenze an ekŋengalen zet sambe keyet keyaŋ ŋotekŋaŋ belup.”
40022041	Âpme Palisi an notnaŋ ondekti tapme Zisasiyaŋ indayaŋkwesimti kapigok zeye,
40022042	“In Kilaisiyet zigok manâip? Ek kwiyelen alikŋaŋ?” Kegok zeme ekŋenaŋ zewien, “Ek Dewitgalen alikŋaŋ.”
40022043	Zeme egaŋ diindoye, “Kwilekiyepmti Dewit ek Kawawaŋgalen Emetak Teŋaŋaŋ ekmak tapme Dewilaŋ Kilaisiyet ‘Amobotnaŋŋ,’ zeye? Zet ke Kawawaŋgalen Zet Itŋaŋanen kapigok kumpepeŋaŋ,
40022044	‘Amobotnaŋaŋ nâlen Amobotnaŋnnaŋgat kapigok zeye, “Geŋ koti nâlen betn penaŋset totapmane kasandine mtoindewap.” ‘ (Sam 110:1)
40022045	Keyepmti Dewilaŋ Kilaisiyet ‘Amobotnaŋŋ,’ zeye beme ke zigoset mti Dewitgat sokŋaŋ bein? Kilais ek Dewitgalen amobotnaŋ.”
40022046	Egaŋ kegok zemti indayaŋkwesime ekŋenaŋ zet dopmaŋ gilik zem sasayet kiŋgabien. Mti kan keyetnaŋ baman gwaen yaŋkwesisi ŋen ku yaŋkwesiwien yek penaŋ.
40023001	Kan keyet palaŋaŋ Zisasiyaŋ am maŋge temaŋ ma nembaŋane ningat dinndoye,
40023002	“Zii zet zikat indanda an ma Palisi ekŋenaŋ ilinaŋgat nâme Mosesinok beme zii zet alakŋaŋ mamsokbeip.
40023003	Ekŋenaŋ in ekŋengalen zii zet alakŋaŋ ke mâbâgalen manzeip yaŋgut neŋ zemkulumindeyap ekŋengalen mama mimi maip ke ku mâbep.
40023004	Ekŋenaŋ zii zet omtususuŋaŋ kegok mme nukŋaŋ beme ingat palen bemti ke mâlit zeme in mâti nukŋaŋ aikme mukulem ku mimindewep. Ekŋenaŋ nukŋaŋ temaŋ ke timti ingat palen bemti ilin belak penaŋ maip.
40023005	Ekŋenaŋ kwitnaŋ kwitnaŋ mamip ke amnaŋ indik ekseseyelen etaŋ mamip. Saŋgum paŋaŋ palen Kawawaŋgalen zii zet kumpemti amnaŋ indidikgalen monzalaminan zampemti ma belinanen saŋgum paŋaŋ temaŋ sepem kegogak besaŋnok zampemti saŋgumin busiliŋaŋ teepteepmaŋ penaŋ amnaŋ indikti ekseseyelen mamiagip.
40023006	Ma ekŋenaŋ tu meu niniyelen indamandame ekŋenaŋ mundum pembenaŋ ma kukŋaŋgat totatagalen mamip. Ma sesewat mkaen ekŋenaŋ amobotnaŋ mundum pembenaŋ keyet manâmtikŋaŋ mip.
40023007	Ekŋenaŋ selen amnaŋ indikti indamukumti nâme mobotnaŋ beme kwilin, ‘Zikat indanda,’ kukuyet maindembein.
40023008	Ma gâgât amnaŋ, ‘Zikat ndanda,’ zeme kwit keboŋ keyet ku nâmtikŋaŋ mbanik. An zikat indandaŋin kwewetaŋ main keyepm in, ‘Notn notn,’ zemti mambep.
40023009	Mti in msalen am ŋengat, ‘Bien,’ ku zewep. Biwin kwewetaŋ ek kululuŋen main.
40023010	Ma in an ŋengat, ‘Ŋeŋaŋ bembe,’ zemindendeyet kegogak ku zewep. Ŋeŋaŋ bembeŋin kwewetaŋ tazin. Ek Mesaya.
40023011	Ma inmagengatnaŋ ŋenaŋ amobotnaŋ masât nâmbe beme notnaŋ ekŋengat sisiliŋ anok mambe.
40023012	Ma ŋenaŋ ikŋaŋgat nâme mobotnaŋ bewe beme Kawawaŋaŋ mtopewe. Ma ŋenaŋ ikŋaŋgat nâme tototnaŋ bewe beme Kawawaŋaŋ mmopewe.
40023013	Wakae, zii zet zikat indanda ma Palisi in sindem omba penaŋ tiwep! In an zegalen etaŋ! In Kawawaŋgalen zemâtâtâtgat katnanen mama keyet keŋan amnaŋ mebegalen mambekek ma manzemkekindeip. Mti ilin kegogak ku mamelip ma am kwiyaŋ mesât mamin ekŋen kegogak mme pepetnaŋmak mamben.
40023014	[In an teŋnok mamaip ma kegok tapmamti imbi kwambet mkaŋinan indamâpme kwawepme milawatnaŋ matip. Âpme in dundundu teepmaŋ nukŋaŋin ku mkawaŋ bembeyelen mandundup keyepmti wakae, in sindem omba penaŋ tiwep.]
40023015	Wakae, zii zet zikat indanda ma Palisi in sindem omba penaŋ tiwep! In an zegalen etaŋ! In set omba tokwati mulup kaliŋan mti am maindatip. An kwep mme ilinaŋgat zapat mambein. An ke mme in sebemindemti bekanaŋ mimiŋin omba beme ekŋenmak in ilinsakwep teziŋ ŋandaŋgat zapat mambein.
40023016	Wakae! In an zikat beŋaŋ nolin set dâsuki tazikat indaip in sindem omba penaŋ tiwep. In manzeip, ‘An ŋen sesewat mka temaŋ teŋ keyet kwitnaŋ zetnaŋ zemkatik bewe beme zetnaŋ penaŋepiŋ bewe kegok zemti naman an ŋenaŋ sesewat mka temaŋgalen golaŋ mka miak pepeŋaŋ keyet kwitnaŋ zetnaŋ zemkatik bein beme zetnaŋ ke penaŋ manâip.’
40023017	In an zikat beŋ ma an seoŋ penaŋ! In nâme kwilekiyaŋ mobotnaŋ bein: gol sesewat mka temaŋ miak pepeŋaŋ tazin ke ma sesewat mka temaŋ ikŋaŋ?” Kegok zemti zeye, “Mka penaŋ keyaŋ mkayelen elimiak miakŋaŋ sebem pein.
40023018	Ma in kegogak manzeip, ‘An ŋenaŋ zetnaŋ sâpe sâpe bumbuyet mundumanen zetnaŋ zemti bandim mbe beme keyaŋ zetnaŋ mme penaŋepiŋ bewe,’ ma kogogak manzeip, ‘An ŋenaŋ sâpe sâpe bumbuyet mundumanen sâpe sâpe tazin keyet kwitnaŋ zetnaŋ bandim mbe beme zetnaŋaŋ penaŋ bewe.’
40023019	In an zikat beŋ! In nâme kwilekiyaŋ mobotnaŋ bein: sâpe sâpe bumbuyet bempeyo ke ma sâpe sâpe mundumaŋ?” Kegok zemti zeye, “Sâpe sâpe ke munduman bemti buwek keyepm sâpe sâpe mundumaŋ keyaŋ mobotnaŋ bein.
40023020	Âpme an kwiyaŋ zetnaŋ sâpe sâpe bumbuyet mundumanen zetnaŋ zemkatik bep beme wa sâpe sâpe mundumaŋ etaŋ yek egaŋ kwitnaŋ kwitnaŋ keyet palen tazin ekŋengat eyo kwilinan zetnaŋ zemkatik bep.
40023021	Ma an ŋenaŋ zetnaŋ sesewat mka temaŋgat kwitnaŋ kumti zetik miwen ke bandim min beme sesewat mka temaŋgat kwitnaŋ etaŋ yek, egaŋ Kawawaŋ sesewat mka temaŋ keyet toŋaŋgat zikatnan zetnaŋ bandim mti zep.
40023022	Ma an ŋenaŋ zetnaŋ kululuŋgat kwitnaŋ kumti zetnaŋ bandim mimiyet zep beme wa kululuŋgat etaŋ yek egaŋ Kawawaŋgalen mundum totatat ma Kawawaŋ ikŋaŋgat zikatnanen zetikŋaŋ bandim mpemti zep.
40023023	Wakae! zii zet zikat indanda ma Palisi in sindem omba penaŋ tiwep! In an zegalen etaŋ! Kwilekiki isikŋaŋ sikok ma suŋem sagom ma kambilak mayawak ma kawak muluwengatnaŋ maŋge 10magengatnaŋ maŋge kwep ke Kawawaŋgat masaip. In kwitnaŋ kwitnaŋ isikŋaŋ keyet eksemti makalopbep yaŋgut in zii zetgalen zet penaŋaŋaŋ tazin ke mamtotindeip. Zii zet ŋotekŋaŋ keyet keŋanen mama mimi kaboŋ kapi mimiyelen eksesemak mama ma aŋgalaŋ gogot palen mama ma nâmkiŋpepemak mamti mulup isisikŋaŋ Kawawaŋgat mulup bandim mimiyet taolet bembe ke eyo mimiyelen. Mama penaŋ zii zelaŋ zeinen ke in ku mamip. In kwitnaŋ kwitnaŋ isisikŋaŋgat tip butzenze mamip.
40023024	In an zikat beŋaŋ nolin zet dâsuki tazikat indaip. In zii zet isisikŋaŋ mamâlip yaŋgut zii zet ŋotekŋaŋ mobotnaŋ ku mamâlip. In sakam an ŋenaŋ tu menzim keŋan kakalak isikŋaŋ tapme ekti ŋep mpenak yaŋgut belaŋ menzim keŋan tadage keyet yayaŋ ku mnak.
40023025	Wakae! zii zet zikat indanda ma Palisi in sindem omba penaŋ tiwep! In menzim sekŋaŋ etaŋ manzululip naman keŋanen zululupiŋ mme meu pâpmaŋ melesiŋ matazin. Ingalen mama mimiŋin sakamaŋ menzim keboŋ. In amgat zikalinan am pembenaŋnok mamaip yaŋgut keŋinan kambu ma segalen kwitnaŋ kwitnaŋaŋ bemisik wen.
40023026	Palisi an in zikalin beŋaŋ! In kukŋaŋgat menzim keŋanen meu pâpmaŋmak ke zulutiŋgulak sekŋaset zulubep.
40023027	Wakae! zii zet zikat indanda ma Palisi in sindem omba penaŋ tiwep! In an zegalen etaŋ. In sakamin am sum sekŋaset elimiakŋaŋ pembenaŋ ma kwetetepmaŋ keyaŋgut keŋaset am kasetnaŋ ma am sek tuŋaŋ sambuŋ kwilak kwilak mimiŋaŋ keboŋ.
40023028	In sepem keboŋ sekŋinaset am zikalinan an teŋnok mamaip yaŋgut keŋŋinaset an nambalamin zut ma in yomtoŋ.
40023029	Wakae! zii zet zikat indanda ma Palisi in sindem omba penaŋ tiwep! In an zegalen etaŋ. In golaŋ zenze an ma an teŋ itnaŋaŋ gakikiŋaŋ ekŋengalen sumen elimiak pembenaŋ miak pemti
40023030	in kapigok manzeip, ‘Nin itnaŋaŋ tipman baen ekŋen yeŋsokŋineyaŋ mambienen mambenek ze nin golaŋ zenze an ma an teŋ ekŋen ku indomann gakiwiek.’
40023031	Ingalen zet keyaŋ yaŋaŋ mkawaŋ beme in am golaŋ zenze an indome gakiwien ekŋengat alikŋine.
40023032	Ŋepgat, in yeŋsokŋineyaŋ am indondo mulup mbien ke in keyegak tusumti msâbip.
40023033	In asiŋ! In asiŋgalen alikŋane! In yominaŋgat dopmaŋ teziŋ ŋandaŋen indeme towesâgât talip ke yaŋaŋ in ku nâmâtâlip? In weyaŋ eksewep.
40023034	Keyepmti zema nâit. Neŋ golaŋ zenze an ma an nânâŋinmak ma zikat indanda indema kopme notnaŋ indome gakiwep. Notnaŋ tewen indowep ma notnaŋ sesewat mkaen sindiwaŋ indawitikbep. Ma notnaŋ sisipeŋpeŋ mimindeme mka pemŋengatnaŋ pemŋen kunzuŋti mebep.
40023035	Keyepmti an teŋ indome gakiwien an indowien ekŋen keyelen yom dopmaŋ mutumindame puwep. An ekŋen ke eweŋan yaŋbembeŋaŋ baenen Keinaŋ meniŋaŋ, Ebel an teŋ kume gakiye keyaŋ yaŋbempeye. Keyetnan Belakiyayet nemuŋaŋ Zakalaya ek sâpe sâpe bumbuyet munduman ma sesewat mka temaŋ tuŋguwitdaŋ amnaŋ nanzaŋaŋ kume gakiye ma sepem kegok ke in an notnaŋ omba indowien.
40023036	Keyet neŋ penaŋ sukwep diindowi, am sambe indom kwabien ekŋengalen yominaŋgat dopmaŋin am in alak kapi talipmagen sokbesâpm.
40023037	O Zelusalem am, Zuda msalen in golaŋ zenze an maindome gakip, ma Kawawaŋgalen zet busup an indeme makolip mee nanzaŋaŋ maindoip. Neŋ in sakokolok mamaŋaŋ nembaŋane pâpmaŋ kandaŋan maŋge kwep maondakindemti am bulut tazin sepem kegok kan sambe neŋ in tima betn kandeŋan kwawowogalen nâma in ku manâmneip.
40023038	Keyepmti neŋ zema nâit, ingalen sesewat mka temaŋ ke Kawawaŋaŋ katipeme ilinaŋgat belinan tapmosâpm.
40023039	Keyepmti neŋ dindowi, in neŋ ewe ku nikbep. Ya neŋ bamgat kopma in pigok zewep, ‘Kawawaŋaŋ Nemuŋaŋ ombempeme kozin keyet nin oloŋen penaŋ mnup,’ (Sam 118:26) kegok zewep.”
40024001	Zisasiyaŋ sesewat mka temaŋ katipemti toti mepme nembaŋane nin ekmagen koti pigok zewenn, “Amobotnaŋ, sesewat mka temaŋ ekpiseseyelen pi ekbaga.”
40024002	Zemann Zisasiyaŋ dopmaŋ gilik zem zeye, “In nanzaŋaŋ mka temaŋ walalatnaŋ kapi alak ego ego mip. Yaŋgut neŋ penaŋ sukwep diindosowap, maneti bamgat nanzaŋaŋ mundumin talip keyet kataŋ ku tabep. Kasa ekŋenaŋ kokume epeemti nanzaŋ igak kwep kwep lala bubuk mekobep.”
40024003	Kegok zemambe met Olip Kalaŋan moti nin yaŋkwesiwan, “Zenagen ke pe zukŋan sokbewe ma geŋ kokodan kanen ma kan delaŋ zenzeŋaŋ piliŋ ziboŋ sokbewe?”
40024004	Zemann egaŋ dinndoye, “In weyaŋekmâtât mambep mineti am ŋenaŋ teti mimindeweyet.
40024005	Am notnaŋaŋ koti zewep, ‘Neŋ Kilais,’ kegok zemti am omba tetimindewep.
40024006	In kasa kwisakŋaŋ ilinmagen sokŋan ma kasa sukwep auuyelen zapatnaŋ nâwep yaŋgut keŋin siŋsiŋ mme yayaŋ mimipiŋ. Kegok ke sokbeweyaŋgut ke kan delaŋ zenzeŋaŋ yek.
40024007	Am msat ŋengatnaŋ ma ŋengatnaŋ dopmaŋ mekum kwakum mbep ma msatgalen amobotnaŋ zulaŋ auwalup. Ma msat kataŋ meuyet kambeŋ temaŋ sokbewe ma msat sambe mâkinaŋ temaŋ mbe.
40024008	Ke sepemaŋ imbiyaŋ nemba titiyelen sindem yaŋbemti manâip sepem keboŋ kwabe.
40024009	Ma am notnaŋaŋ ekŋenaŋ in nâmkiŋpemneip keyepm msat palengalen amobotnaŋ ekŋengat belinan beme ekŋenaŋ sisipeŋpeŋ mimindewep. In neŋmak tusumti mambepgapmti am sambe ekŋenaŋ ingat nâme kaŋgaŋaŋ bewe.
40024010	Kan keyet am sambe nâmkiŋpepeŋinmak ku mkatik bem tabep am notnaŋ nâmkiŋpepeŋinmak zemsokbemindame ekŋenaŋ ma notnaŋaŋ am notnaŋgat ilinaŋgat keŋ kasa mimindewep.
40024011	Ma kegogak golaŋ zenze an dâsuki ekŋenaŋ koti am sambe keŋin mme yuŋgu mâbe.
40024012	Ma mama mimi bekanaŋaŋ palakŋaŋ beme am notnaŋaŋ nolinaŋgat notn notn ku mbep.
40024013	Yaŋgut amnaŋ an ŋen nâmkiŋpepemak sisipeŋpeŋ msame egaŋ nâmkiŋpepeŋaŋ katikŋaŋ atam tapmetneti gakiwe beme kan delaŋ zenzeŋaŋ Kawawaŋaŋ an ke mama kanzizit sawe.
40024014	Mti Kawawaŋgalen zemâtâtâtgat katnanen mama keyet zapatnaŋaŋ msat kataŋ mekopme am sambe nâmeŋgut kan delaŋ zenze sokbewe.
40024015	Âpme kan tipman baenen golaŋ zenze an Danielaŋ, ‘Kwileki ŋen mamaŋaŋmak ma kiŋgagatnaŋmak kotabe,’ keyet zetnaŋ zeye. Kwitnaŋ kwitnaŋ keyaŋ ingalen sesewat mka kambu manzeip keyet keŋan sokbem tapme am zet kapi maiŋti nâmambe ekŋenaŋ keyet yaŋaŋ nâmâtâbep.
40024016	Âpme kan keyet am Zudia msalen talip ekŋenaŋ kunzuŋti kalaŋ dukŋan mowebep.
40024017	Ma am ŋenaŋ mka solonan tapmambe ya kan keyaŋ sokbeme milawatnaŋ mka keŋan ku akum tiwe. Egaŋ keyegak tati kunzuŋ mebe.
40024018	Ma sepem kegogak am ŋenaŋ kolopmaŋ mkaŋan tapme ikŋaŋ mulupman tapmambe beme keyaŋ sokbeme kolopmaŋgat nâmti mkaŋan kokopiŋ. Egaŋ keyegak tati kunzuŋ mebe.
40024019	Kan keyet imbi keŋmak ma nembaŋin okakŋaŋ ekŋenaŋ kunzunzuŋgalen timyapewep ke kembeŋ penaŋ.
40024020	In Kawawaŋ dundum same nâmindame kunzunzuŋin map tâgâ kanen ma Sabat tagoŋgo kanen ku sokbemindawe!
40024021	Keyepm kan keyet nukŋaŋ omba penaŋ sokbemâbe. Nukŋaŋ keboŋ ke itnaŋaŋ msat sokbembeŋaŋgatnaŋ alak tatnup kapi keboŋ ŋen ku sokbeye ma bam gwaenen ŋen ku sokbewe.
40024022	Egaŋ an imbi ikŋaŋgat zapat indamakuye ekŋengapm kan ke mme danaŋ bewe ekŋen yek benak ze nukŋaŋ ke kan danaŋ ku tapme am sambe walapme delaŋ zenak.
40024023	Âpme kan keyet an ŋenaŋ pigok zewe, ‘Egit, kilais daen tazin,’ ma ‘Pi tazin,’ zeme nâmbep beme ku nâmkiŋpewep.
40024024	Ma kilais dâsuki sambe ma golaŋ zenze an dâsuki sambe ekŋenaŋ sokbemti menok sepem igak igak ma mulup piseseŋaŋmak mme amnaŋ ekti nâmkiŋpemti indamâbâgalen mbep. Sepem kegogak Kawawaŋaŋ am ikŋaŋgat zapat indamakuye ekŋen keyet keŋin myuŋguindesâgât mbep.
40024025	Nâip, neŋ kwitnaŋ kwitnaŋ keyet tazemsalaŋ beyap ke sokbesâpm.
40024026	Âpme amnaŋ pigok zewep, ‘Egit, kilais ek msat tuŋgupman tazin.’ Zeme ke mebepiŋ. Ma ŋen pigok zewep, ‘Ek mka keŋan tazin.’ Zeme nâmkiŋpepepiŋ.
40024027	Âpme neŋ Angat Nemuŋaŋ neŋ ambeyak sakam kasup kwakwatnasetgatnaŋ tototnaset ilindiŋ sakwep beyak mamnok neŋ kegok kobap. Kegok kopma am sambeyaŋ ŋep nikbep.
40024028	Neŋ kokotnnaŋgalen kanen nâlen maŋgeyaŋ ekme tep katnaŋ saŋgamaŋ penaŋ elikme age sambeyaŋ maondagip. Sekam kegogak kwitnaŋ kwitnaŋ ke ilinmagen sokbeme ekti nâmkawaŋ bewep.
40024029	Nukŋaŋ sambe ke delaŋ peme keyegak, ‘kasup zikatnaŋ sopkusâpm ma eyoŋga busatnaŋ yek besâpm ma wenzimaŋ kululuŋengatnaŋ âtâtosâbip.’ (Aizaya 13:10; 34:4) Ma Kawawaŋaŋ kululuŋ buteme titok mme kululuŋengalen kwitnaŋ kwitnaŋ sambe keyaŋ puluk pilik zem mekobep.
40024030	In Angat Nemuŋaŋ neŋ nâlen kokotnnaŋgalen kanaŋ ma pilinaŋgat yaŋkwesiwien kelak dindosowap. Ma in Angat Nemuŋaŋ neŋ mgulumbuk palen kululuŋen tati windemak saŋga soŋga keŋan busatnaŋmak kopma niksâbip. Am maŋge msat sambeyelen ekŋenaŋ nikti susâbip.
40024031	Kan kobawen keyet lumun kwisak omba kume egaŋ enselŋane zemindeme msat ganzenaŋ nembet ma nembet ma gwaen ma baen meti am ikŋaŋgat zapat makumindendeŋaŋ ekŋen msat kataŋgatnaŋ ondekindewep.
40024032	Âpme in balam balam tep ekŋengat otnâit. Kan tep balam balam katnaŋ yaŋbemti kwapme manzeip, ‘O, ilak mtete yaŋbesâpm ma tep gwazege sinaŋaŋ taalaŋ sime’ in manzeip, ‘Tonne mtete tasâpm,’ manan sinaŋ betnaŋaŋ epeemti sinaŋaŋ tapmme manzenup, ‘Mawalam tasâpm.’
40024033	Sakam kegogak in bamgat nukŋaŋ sambe sokbeme ekti nâme kan ilak sokŋan bududuk bein keyepm in weyayaŋ mulup mtalit.
40024034	Neŋ penaŋ sukwep diindowi, am alak talip kapi ilindiŋ ku gakimâpme kwileki sambe kapi sokbesâpm.
40024035	Msat ma kululuŋ eget asekmalu delaŋ zesâpm yaŋgut nâlen zetnnaŋ delaŋ zenzeŋepiŋ matapmambe.
40024036	Am ŋenaŋ Angat Nemuŋaŋgalen kan kokogalen ke ku nâin. Ensel kululuŋengatnaŋ ekŋenaŋ ku nâip. Nemuŋaŋ neŋ kegogak ku nâyap. Bipmnaŋ igak etaŋ kan ke nâin.
40024037	Angat Nemuŋaŋ neŋ kokotnnaŋgalen ke itnaŋaŋ Noamagen sokbeye sepem kegok sokbewe.
40024038	Tuŋgwam kosât mge kan keyet am ekŋenaŋ itnaŋaŋ mamimtemienok tu meu nimwiaŋbien ma an imbiyaŋ awembiŋ bemti msalengalen kwitnaŋ kwitnaŋgat otnâmti Kawawaŋgat ku otnâwien. Sepem kegok tapmme Noayaŋ waŋgaŋaŋ teman keŋan mowege.
40024039	Yaŋgut ekŋenaŋ zigok sokbesâpm ke nâme dâsuki beme tatnepeme tuŋgwagemaŋ ilindiŋ indaminziliye. Sepem kok penaŋ Angat Nemuŋaŋ neŋ kosowawen sokbesâpm.
40024040	Kan keyet an zut muluwen mulup tapmambaluwaŋ kwep ŋen teti meti ŋen peme tabe.
40024041	Imbi zulaŋ saŋgo sâŋsâŋ tapmambaluwaŋ kwep ŋen teti meti ŋen peme tabe.
40024042	Amobotnaŋin kan zukŋan kobe ke in ku nâipgapmti kelem mti nâpeŋ nâpeŋ mambep.
40024043	In pigok nâit, mka toŋaŋaŋ kan kwilekiyet an kambu titiyaŋ kokogalen ke nânak beme egaŋ keik tati mkaŋaŋ damuŋ mme an kambu titiyaŋ mka ku asekti keŋan tiŋkwabiek.
40024044	Sepem kegogak Angat Nemuŋaŋ neŋ in kan zukŋan sokbewap ke nânâpiŋ tapme kobapgapmti in weyaŋti nâpeŋ nâpeŋ mamambep.
40024045	Mulup nemba dolakŋaŋ nânâŋaŋmagaŋ mulup kapigok mbe. Amobotnaŋaŋaŋ pem ŋen mesât mti mulup nemba notnaŋ ekŋengat damuŋ peme egaŋ indikdamuŋ mti meu kananen teŋ maindain.
40024046	Kegok tapmme bamgat amobotnaŋaŋ gilik zem kobeen ekme mulup nemba egaŋ zemâtâtpeyenok tapmme ekti nâme oloŋen bewe.
40024047	Neŋ penaŋ sukwep diindowi, ek ke amobotnaŋaŋaŋ ikŋaŋgalen kwitnaŋ kwitnaŋ sambe ke egat betnan beme ekdamuŋ mbe.
40024048	Âk egaŋ mulup nemba bekanaŋ penaŋ beme egaŋ keŋan pigok nâwe, ‘Amobotnaŋŋ ek sakwep ku kobe.’
40024049	Kegok nâmti egaŋ mulup nemba notnane indomti meu ma tu katikŋaŋ an tu katikŋaŋ nini ekŋenmak nimbe.
40024050	Âpme mulup nemba egat amobotnaŋaŋ egalen kanaŋ kokogalen ku nâmâtâbe.
40024051	Mti amobotnaŋaŋaŋ dopmaŋ omba penaŋ mutumsamti putatime an nambalamin zut ekŋenmak mambe. Mamti sindemgat si zemsu zemsu mti zelin aŋgalikme mamambep.
40025001	Kan keyet Kawawaŋgalen zemâtâtâtgat katnanen mama ke imbi nembip 10 ekŋenaŋ taŋamin timti an ŋenaŋ imbi wawagalen kopme selen aiikgalen mebien ke sepem sokbewe.
40025002	Ekŋenmagengatnaŋ imbi nemba 5 ekŋen nânâŋinpiŋ ma 5 ekŋen nânâŋinmak.
40025003	Nânâŋinpiŋ ekŋenaŋ taŋamin mbienaŋgut tuŋaŋ butnaŋ ŋamgat ku mbien.
40025004	Âpme nânâŋinmak ekŋenaŋ seŋgewinan taŋam tuŋaŋ kasime topme taŋaminmak ilinsakwep mmebien.
40025005	An imbi wawagalen egaŋ sakwep ku kopme imbi nembip ekŋenaŋ damuŋ tabienaŋ melupgat sukŋaŋ bemti meluk wembien.
40025006	Tawene peme tambu sutnan temaŋ kwizet pigok koge, ‘An imbi wawagalen kozin! In wati toaigit!’
40025007	Kegok kume nâmti imbi nembip ekŋenaŋ ilindiŋ wati taŋamin weyaŋbien.
40025008	Kegok mti nânâŋinpiŋ ekŋenaŋ nânâŋinmak ekŋengat zewien, ‘In nin taŋam tuŋaŋ bugan kasim ndait. Ningalen taŋamlak bep zein.’
40025009	Zeme nânâŋinmak ekŋenaŋ gilik zemti zewien, ‘Inmak ninmak nsakwep tuŋaŋ bugan kapiyaŋ ŋep ku bendesemgat in dalaŋ mkaen met ilinaŋgat kwitim kolit.’
40025010	Kegok zemindeme imbi nembip nânâŋinpiŋ ekŋenaŋ tuŋaŋ kwitisât mebien. Ekŋenaŋ met mame mame an imbi wawagalenaŋ pataŋ peye. Âpme imbi nembip 5 damuŋ tabien ekŋenaŋ ekmak awembiŋ bembeyelen tu meuyet ondedak mkaen mowepme sekekek kege.
40025011	Kegok sokbeme bamgat imbi nembip nânâŋinpiŋ ekŋenaŋ pataŋ zemti zewien, ‘Amobotnaŋ, amobotnaŋ, nâmndemane kwatne!’
40025012	An imbi wawagalenaŋ zeye, ‘Neŋ penaŋ diindowi, neŋ in kandat indeyap.’
40025013	Zisasiyaŋ zet kegok zemdelaŋ zemti kapigok zeye, in kan kwilekiyet ma bet kwilekiyet ma tambuŋan ma gasiyet kobe ke ku nâip keyepmti in kelem mbep.
40025014	Maneti amobotnaŋ ŋenaŋ msat pemŋen mesât mti egaŋ mulup nembaŋane kume kopme kwilekikiŋaŋ sambe belinan bemti ekdamuŋ mimiyet zemindeye.
40025015	Egaŋ mulup nemba kwep kwep ekŋengat sepemin ma windeŋin nâmti keyet kataŋ mânep indaye. Kwep ŋen 5000 kina saye. Ŋen 2000 kina saye. Ŋen 1000 kina saye. Kegok indamâti egaŋ msat sukwep mege.
40025016	Egaŋ mepme mepme mulup nemba 5000 kina tiye egaŋ sakwep penaŋ mânep keyaŋ mulupmaŋ mmepme 5000 kina ŋen ewe mânep tâgâŋaŋ aige.
40025017	Sepem kegogak mulup nemba mânep 2000 kina tiye egaŋ mulupmaŋ mmepme 2000 kina ŋen ewe mânep tâgâŋaŋ aige.
40025018	Âpme mulup nemba mânep 1000 kina tiye egaŋ mobotnaŋaŋgalen mânep ke msat walati keŋan kwatampeye.
40025019	Kan teepmaŋ penaŋ delaŋ zeme bamgat mulup nemba ekŋengat amobotnaŋinaŋ gilik zem koge. Koti mânep indaye keyelen yaŋaŋ nâsât ondek indeye.
40025020	Mulup nemba 5000 kina tiye egaŋ 5000 kina tâgâŋaŋ aikge ke mkoti zeye, ‘Amobotnaŋ ekbak, geŋ 5000 kina nawananaŋ neŋ mulupmaŋ sama 5000 kina tâgâŋaŋ aikban.’
40025021	Amobotnaŋaŋ zeye, ‘Geŋ mulup nemba pembenaŋ penaŋ. Geŋ zetn gawepumti mulup pembenaŋ penaŋ mbanan. Geŋ mânep isikŋaŋ ŋep mandamuŋ mnikgapmti neŋ mânep temaŋgat damuŋ mimiyelen gewap. Geŋ neŋmak kopmane oloŋen mdi.’
40025022	Mulup nemba 2000 kina tiye egaŋ kogak koti zeye, ‘Amobotnaŋ, geŋ 2000 kina nawanan. Ekbak, neŋ mulupmaŋ sama 2000 kina tâgâŋaŋ aikban.’
40025023	Amobotnaŋaŋaŋ pigok dunduye, ‘Geŋ mulup nemba pembenaŋ penaŋ. Geŋ zetn gawepumti mulup weyaŋti mbanan. Geŋ mânep isikŋaŋ ekdamuŋ ŋep mbanan keyepmti neŋ mânep temaŋgat damuŋ mimiyelen gewap. Keyet geŋ neŋmak kopmane oloŋen mdi.’
40025024	Âpme mulup nemba 1000 kina tiye egaŋ koti zeye, ‘Amobotnaŋ, neŋ nâyap ke geŋ an katikŋaŋ. Geŋ mânep tuŋgupmaŋ nembandineyaŋ monze onze mulup mti onzenzeŋanengatnaŋ timti tosayet bemane kopme matinik ma geŋ mânep setnaŋ mtitiyelen omba nâmtatnik.
40025025	Kegok nâmti neŋ mânep tima mebegat kiŋgati met 1000 kina ke msat keŋan atam pema matazin keyepmti ekbak, kapi gitaŋgalen mânep ikŋaŋ ke gilik zem gayap.’
40025026	Zeme amobotnaŋaŋ gilik zemti zeye, ‘Geŋ mulup an bekanaŋ ma awisatoŋ! Geŋ nânak, neŋ mânep tuŋgupmaŋ nembanneyaŋ monze onze mulup mti onzenzeŋanengatnaŋ timti tosayet bema kopme matiap ma neŋ mânep setnaŋ mtitiyelen omba nâmtalap.
40025027	Nâmane kegok beme geŋ nâlen mânepm mânep mkaŋan bewekwan ya neŋ gilik ze kobagen nenaŋgalen mânep ilindiŋ timti tâgâŋaŋ notnaŋ tiwak.’
40025028	Amobotnaŋ kegok zemti gilik zemti an mulup an ŋengat zeye, ‘Mânep ke menzem mti an 10,000 kina tasain ke sait.’
40025029	Amobotnaŋ keyaŋ tusumti zeye, ‘An ŋenaŋ kwileki notnaŋ tasame keyet mulupmaŋ mam beme kwileki notnaŋ ewe tusumti same ekmagen polak polak wemsawe. Âk am ŋenaŋ kwileki ŋen isikŋaŋ tasame mulupmaŋ ku mbe beme ewe kwileki isikŋaŋ penaŋ bugan tasain ke kogogak menzempewep.
40025030	Keyepmti mulup nemba bekanaŋ ke putatime zupman tambusosok keŋan ke mamti si zemsu zemsu mti zetnaŋ aŋgalikti mamambe.’
40025031	Maneti Angat Nemuŋaŋ neŋ winde temaŋmak enselne indatetimti kosowap. Koti damuŋ mulup mimiyelen Amobotnaŋgalen munduman totasowap.
40025032	Âpme am sambe msat ŋen msat ŋen keyet keŋangatnaŋ am ilindiŋ mamkandaŋnan ondek indesowap. Sekam sipsip damuŋaŋ sipsipmak meme makalaŋidein sepem kogak mbap.
40025033	Mti neŋ am teŋ maip ekŋen betn penaset zemindema tabep naman am notnaŋ betn alomeset zemindema tabep.
40025034	Maŋge bemindemti Amobotnaŋ neŋ am betn penaset pigok diindowap, ‘In Bienmak tusum talip keyepm kolit. Kawawaŋgalen zemâtâtâtgat katnanen mama keŋan mamayelen eweŋan msat sokbeme baenen ke weyaŋpepeŋaŋgat koti mama kanzizit tit.
40025035	Ke pigogat neŋ meuyet mma in meu nambien. Neŋ tuyet tapmma in tu name nimban. Neŋ an mamanam kopma in notn mnemti mkaŋinan natetimobien.
40025036	Neŋ melakandunduyet olapma in melakandu nawien. Neŋ zawat mma in nikdamuŋ mbien. Neŋ mka katikŋan tapma in met nikdamuŋ mti mukulem mnembien. Keyepmti in kolit.’
40025037	Zema am teŋ bembeŋaŋaŋ pigok gilik zesâbip, ‘Amobotnaŋ, nin kan kwilekiyet geŋ gikmann meuyet tapmmane meu gawenn ma tuyet tapmmane tu gawenn?
40025038	Ma geŋ denen an mamanamaŋ kopmane nin weyaŋgewenn ma melakandunduyet olapmane melakandu gawenn?
40025039	Ma kan kwilekiyet zawalen ma mka katikŋan wemane nin mukulem mgewenn?’
40025040	Âpme Amobotnaŋ neŋ zet dopmaŋ pigok gilik zewap, ‘Neŋ penaŋ zema nâit, in kan ke ma keyet nâlen notn an tototnaŋ nâmkiŋpepemak mukulem mpewien in ke ek etaŋ ku mukulem mpewien. Ke neŋ mukulem mnewienok bein.’
40025041	Mti neŋ betn alomset tabep ekŋengat pigok zewap, ‘In nenemti sebeit! In teziŋ ŋandayet zapat ombemindendeŋaŋ. Teziŋ taŋamaŋ delaŋ zenzeŋepiŋ ke Sadaŋ ma enselŋane ekŋengat weyaŋpepeŋaŋ keyet keŋan towelip!
40025042	Ke pigogat neŋ meuyet mma in meu ku nawien. Neŋ tuyet mma in tu ku nawien.
40025043	Neŋ an mamanam kopma in neŋ notn mnemti mkaen ku newien. Neŋ melakandunduyet olapma in neŋ melakandu ku nawien. Neŋ zawalen ma mka katikŋan tapma in ku namukulem mnewien.’
40025044	Zema ekŋenaŋ pigok gilik zem zewep, ‘Amobotnaŋ, nin denen gikmann meuyet mmane ma tuyet mmane ma an mamanam kopmane ma melakandunduyet olapmane ma zawalen wemane ma mka katikŋan tapmane nin ku mukulem mgewenn?’
40025045	Âpme Amobotnaŋ neŋ dopmaŋ pigok gilik zem indawap. ‘Neŋ penaŋ sukwep diindowi, in kan ke ma keyet nâlen notnne peweweŋaŋ ekŋenmagengatnaŋ ŋen mukulem ku mpewien beme in neŋ ku mukulem mnewienok bein.’
40025046	Kokgapmti zemindema ekŋenaŋ yomgalen dopmaŋ gakiki delaŋ zenzepiŋ keŋanen towebep. Âpme am teŋ Kawawaŋgat zet kandaŋan maiwaŋ mama kanzizit tiwep.”
40026001	Âpme Zisasiyaŋ zet sambe ke zemzikat indame delaŋ peme nembaŋane ningat pigok dinndoye,
40026002	“Bet mulup mimi zut delaŋ peme Aŋgalalaŋ Kendo bewe ke in ŋep nâip. Kan keyet neŋ kasanneyaŋ zemnomti Angat Nemuŋaŋ amgat belinan neme tewen nowep.”
40026003	Kan keyegak sâpe sâpe bumbu an ŋeŋaŋ sambe ma sesewat mka temaŋgalen an damuŋ ekŋenaŋ sâpe sâpe bumbu an sambeyelen ŋeŋaŋin kwitnaŋ Kayapas egalen mka temanen ondekti
40026004	Zisas buzageset atamti kume gakikiyelen setnaŋgat zenâ zenâ mbien.
40026005	Yaŋgut ilinak pigok zewien, “Nin kendo keŋan kapi ku msenup. Mnepemann am sambeyaŋ kasa kileŋ mseipmagengat.”
40026006	Âpme Zisasiyaŋ Betani mkaen tage ke an ŋen kwitnaŋ Saimon ek sekŋaŋ liŋgit satnaŋmak itnaŋaŋ mamtan ya Zisasiyaŋ weyaŋpeye egalen mkaen tabien.
40026007	Ke motati meu tatnmann imbi ŋenaŋ wet kelakŋaŋ sesikŋaŋ pembenaŋ penaŋ seŋgepmaŋmak tosaŋaŋ temaŋ ke mkoti Zisasiyet ŋokŋan mulapeye.
40026008	Âpme imbiyaŋ kegok mme nembaŋaneyaŋ nin ekti ŋenzinziŋ mti yaŋkwesiwenn, “Kwilekiyepmti pi belak walezin?
40026009	Wet kelakŋaŋ kapi tosayet beme mânep temaŋ ime kopme am bekopsat indandayelen.”
40026010	Zemann Zisasiyaŋ nin zigok zewenn ke nâmti, “In kwilekiyet mti imbi dundumti zekalumpeip? Egaŋ mnep ke pembenaŋ penaŋ.
40026011	Am bekopsat ekŋenaŋ inmak kwesiŋ penaŋ mamambep âpme neŋgut inmak kwesiŋ kapi ku mamambap.
40026012	Imbi egaŋ kwileki mip ke nâgât sekŋ kapi weyaŋti kelakŋaŋaŋ zulupeme sumen nambembeyelen mip.
40026013	Neŋ penaŋ sukwep dindowi, msat kataŋ deset ma deset Kawawaŋgalen Zet Zapat Dolakŋaŋ Penaŋ kapi mebennok imbi kapiyaŋ nâgât mnep kapi kogogak zenâ mti egat otnâwep.”
40026014	Âpme nembaŋane 12 ninmagengatnaŋ kwep ŋen kwitnaŋ Zudas Iskaliotgatnaŋ egaŋ sâpe sâpe bumbu an ŋeŋaŋ ekŋenmagen meti
40026015	pigok indayaŋkwesiye, “Neŋ Zisas in zikat indamti belinan bema in tosaŋaŋ kwileki naseip?” Yaŋkwesime ekŋenaŋ mânep silwa kasetnaŋ 30 kegok makumti sawien.
40026016	Âpme Zudasiyaŋ kan keyet yaŋbemti, “Zigoset mti Zisas zemkusap,” zemti setnaŋgat timage.
40026017	Âpme Nupmamaŋ Yispiŋ Niniyelen Kendo keyet yaŋbembeŋaŋ nembaŋane nin Zisasmagen koti yaŋkwesiwenn, “Geŋ nin Aŋgalalaŋ Kendoyelen tu meu denen weyaŋ bembeyelen gambein?”
40026018	Yaŋkwesimann Zisasiyaŋ zeye, “In Zelusalem mka temaŋ keŋan meti an ŋen aikseip keyet pigok dunduseip, ‘Ningalen zikat ndandayaŋ zep, “Nâlen gakiki kan ilak daŋgoin keyepm nembanemak nin Aŋgalalaŋ Kendoyet gâlen mkaen tasenup,” ‘kegok zeseip.’ ’
40026019	Nembaŋane nin Zisasiyaŋ ikŋaŋ zemâtâtndeye keyet kataŋ mâti Aŋgalalaŋ Kendoyet tu meu weyaŋ bewenn.
40026020	Kegok mti mkokok kume Zisas ma nin 12 nsakwep tu meu niniyelen tomtabenn.
40026021	Ke tati tu meu nimambe Zisasiyaŋ dinndoye, “Neŋ penaŋ diindowi inmagengatnaŋ ŋenaŋ neŋ zemnosem.”
40026022	Kegok zeme nembaŋane nin keŋ sindem mti ikŋaŋgat kwep kwep yaŋbemti yaŋkwesiwenn, “Amobotnaŋ, geŋ nâgât tazenik, ma?”
40026023	Kegok yaŋkwesimann delaŋpeme Zisasiyaŋ dinndoye, “An ŋenaŋ nupmamaŋ tu batien nsakwep pemalu towepme nselup an keyaŋ neŋ zemnosem.
40026024	Angat Nemuŋaŋ neŋ Kawawaŋgalen Zet Itnaŋaŋ zeinok gakiwap yaŋgut an ŋenaŋ Angat Nemuŋaŋ neŋ kasayet belinan besâpm an ke wakae, sindem omba penaŋ tiwe. An ke mamaŋaŋ ku ambedak ze ŋep bempenak.”
40026025	Zudas an keyaŋ Zisas kasayet belinan beweyaŋ zeye, “Zikat indanda, geŋ nâgât tazenik, ma?” Zeme Zisasiyaŋ dunduye, “Geŋ zenik kok kemak.”
40026026	Zemti Zisasiyaŋ nupmamaŋ ŋen mti Kawawaŋgat wisikŋ zemutumti ndamti zeye, “In mti nit. Kapi nanaŋgat sek sesumbannok.”
40026027	Nimann delaŋ zeme wain okop tageen ke mti Kawawaŋgat wisikŋ zemti kegogak ndamti zeye, “In ilindiŋ mti nit.”
40026028	Ewe tatnimambe zeye, “Kapi nanaŋgat sipmnok. Kapi tâtâ alakŋaŋ ammak Kawawaŋmak sipmnaŋ tâmindeyap. Âpme sipm tewen nome sipmnaŋ tobe ke am sambe ekŋen yomengatnan indatim kwakwagat nâmti kegok mbap.”
40026029	Kegok zemti zeye, “Neŋ penaŋ sukwep zema nâit, neŋ wain tu ke ninipiŋ maneti bamgat Biengalen zemâtâtât katnanen mama kululuŋen gwaen tati wain alakŋaŋ ke nsakwep nbanup.”
40026030	Zeme delaŋ zeme keyegak tapeŋ tati sesewat silik kumann delaŋ zeme mkaengatnan toti tambuyelak Olip Kalaŋan mowebenn.
40026031	Motati Zisasiyaŋ nembaŋane nin pigok dinndoye, “In kasa kuku an ekŋenaŋ kopme ekŋengat kiŋgati nemkunzuŋ mekopme nenak etaŋ tasap. Kawawaŋgalen Zet Itnaŋanen ikŋaŋ pigok zeye, ‘Neŋ sipsip damuŋ kuma gakime sipsip ekŋenaŋ kileŋ lala bubuk kunzuŋ mekobep.’ (Zekaraia 13:7)
40026032	Yaŋgut bam Kawawaŋaŋ neŋ mme gakikiengatnan gilik zem watiŋgut Galili msalen mepma in bam napmâkobep.”
40026033	Zeme Pitayaŋ zemkatik bemti pigok zeye, “Nemba notnaŋaŋ bamkumgemeseip yaŋgut neŋ ŋep ku bamkumgemesap.!”
40026034	Zeme Zisasiyaŋ dopmaŋ pigok gilik zem saye, “Alak tambumbu kapiyet sakokolok apmaŋ kwitnaŋ sakwep kumti sek zut ewe kukupiŋ tapme geŋ nâgât sek tuk yaŋnesenik.”
40026035	Zeme Pitayaŋ zekaŋkaŋ mti zeye, “Neŋ nome gakikiyelen msawaŋgut neŋ geŋ ku yaŋgesap penaŋ.” Zeme nemba notnaŋ sambe nin zet sepemaŋ kwep kegogak zemâbenn.
40026036	Zemti nsakwep olip muluwen msat kwitnaŋ Getsemani ke mebenn. Mepataŋ zemti Zisasiyaŋ nembaŋane ningat zeye, “In kapi totapme neŋ nenak daen metati dundumti kosap.”
40026037	Zemti egaŋ Pita ma Zebediyet nemuŋane zut idatetime mebien. Ke meti Zisasiyaŋ yaŋbemti kembeŋ ma keŋ sindem omba nâye.
40026038	Nâmti nembaŋane tuk ekŋengat zeye, “Neŋ keŋŋ sindem beme gakikiyelenok tapmiap keyepm in muluk wewepiŋ. Neŋmak keik tapmasenup.”
40026039	Kegok zemti belaknik bugan met ŋeŋzimosetnaset msalen kutuwemti pigok dunduye, “Bien, geŋ nâmane ŋep mimiyelen beme sek sindemgalen nukŋaŋ kapi mâtâtne! Keyaŋgut neŋ nâyapnok yek. Giti nânik kataŋ sokbesem.”
40026040	Kegok mti egaŋ gilik zem koti nembaŋane tuk indikme meluk taweme indabutemti Pitayet pigok dunduye, “In tuk kwilekiyepmti neŋmak kan belaknik bugan pi keik tati otnânâ mulup bugan ku mbiek?
40026041	In keik tati dombemti dunduit mneti nukŋanen toindosem. Keŋinaŋ nâgât kembeŋ nâyo yaŋgut sekŋinaŋ nukŋaŋ beme tawemo.”
40026042	Zisasiyaŋ sek ŋen ewe meti dunduye, “Bien, sek sindemgalen nukŋaŋ kapi ŋep ku mâtâpepeyelen beme ma neŋ ke pupuyelen penaŋ bein beme geŋ nâniknok neŋ ŋep pusap.”
40026043	Egaŋ sek ŋen ewe gilik zem koti nembaŋane koindikme meluk tawemambien enenogat zikalinan nukŋaŋ penaŋ beye.
40026044	Zisasiyaŋ nembaŋane katim indemti ewe gilik zem meti dundundu sek tuk mge. Ke zet eweŋan dundumti zeye keyegak dunduye.
40026045	Mti egaŋ nembaŋanemagen gilik zemkoti zeye, “In ewe meluk wemwat wemwat ma kâtnâmtat kâtnâmtat tapmip? Egit! neŋ Angat Nemuŋaŋ kasannaŋ zemnomti am yomtoŋ ekŋengat belinan neneyelen kanlak bein.
40026046	Wati, kopme metne! Egit, an ŋen neŋ zemnonoyelen ilak kolep!”
40026047	Zisasiyaŋ ewe nembaŋane nin zet tadindome dindome Zudas nembaŋane 12 ninmagengatnaŋ kwep egaŋ am maŋge temaŋmak wanam ŋilikŋaŋ ma wenzom timti kobien. An ekŋen ke sâpe sâpe bumbu an ŋeŋaŋ ma sesewat mka temaŋgalen an damuŋ ekŋenaŋ zemindeme kobien.
40026048	Selen kopmambe Zudasiyaŋ pigok zemâtâtindaye, “Neŋ meti an mukumpesap ke in ekti keyegagak ataseip.”
40026049	Zeyenok Zudasiyaŋ Zisasmagen teŋ mebedak zeye, “Tambuyet Amobotnaŋ!” Zemti naŋguman nuknuk mpeye.
40026050	Âpme Zisasiyaŋ pigok dunduye, “Kwilekiyet nâmkodak ze, sakwep mi!” Zeme ekŋenaŋ Zisasiyet betnaŋ kili kili atamti zampewien.
40026051	Atame an Zisasmak mamambien ekŋenmagengatnaŋ ŋenaŋ wanamaŋ ŋilikŋaŋ mandam kwati sâpe sâpe bumbu an sambeyelen ŋeŋaŋgat mulup nembaŋaŋ wakŋaŋ nembet sâmpeye.
40026052	Mme Zisasiyaŋ egat pigok zeye, “Geŋ wanamdi munduman gilik zem bepe. Zigogak an ŋenaŋ wanamaŋ kasa makuip ek an notnaŋaŋ wanamaŋ kegogak aŋme gakiwe.
40026053	Âpme neŋ Biengat mukulem mimiyet yaŋkwesima egaŋ alagalak kapiyet ensel sopmaŋ sambe penaŋ ku makukuyelen zemindeme kot napmukulem mbiek. Ke geŋ ku nânik?
40026054	Kawawaŋgalen Zet Itnaŋanen kapigok zenzeŋaŋ neŋ ŋep sindem titiyelen keyepm Kawawaŋgat nemukulem mimiyelen zewak beme Kawawaŋgalen zet itnaŋaŋ keyaŋ penaŋmak ku benak.”
40026055	Kan keyet Zisasiyaŋ an maŋge temaŋ pigok diindoye, “In nâgât nâme an kambu tititoŋ beme in wanam ŋilikŋaŋ ma wenzomak natatayelen kolo? Neŋ kasup kataŋ Kawawaŋgalen sesewat mka temaŋ keŋan tomtati manzikat indamtemanaŋgut in ku natawien.
40026056	Keyaŋgut kwileki sambe sokbep ke nâgât Kawawaŋgalen Zet Itnaŋanen golaŋ zenze an zet meluwaŋ mge ke penaŋaŋ sokbemkawaŋ bembeyelen.” Kegok mme nembaŋane nin ilindiŋ katikpemti kunzuŋ mebenn.
40026057	Âpme am Zisas atawien ekŋenaŋ mmeti Kayapas, sâpe sâpe bumbu an sambe ekŋengalen ŋeŋaŋin egat mkaen an zii zet zikat indanda ma sesewat mka temaŋgalen an damuŋ sambeyaŋ ondektabienen ke tetimebien.
40026058	Mepme Pitayaŋ ewe sukwep tati indamâti Kayapasiyet mka kimbalen mege. Meti kimbat keŋan moti zigok sokbesem ke eegalen Zuda ekŋengalen an kukŋaŋbeŋ kimbat damuŋ ekŋenmak tomtage.
40026059	Âpme sâpe sâpe bumbu an ma Zuda am ekŋengalen am ŋeŋaŋ bembeŋin sambeyaŋ Zisas zet zigoset ma kwilekiyet bemzemti gakikiyet zemdelaŋ zempepeyelen timabien.
40026060	Am sambe penaŋaŋ ŋeŋaŋ kot sokbemti dâsuki bemzewienaŋgut zet ŋen ku aikbien. Bam delaŋ zenzeŋan an zulaŋ kot sokbemti
40026061	zewun, “An kapiyaŋ zeye, ‘Neŋ ŋep Kawawaŋgalen sesewat mka temaŋ kapi asekmatopme delaŋ zeme nan bet mulup mimi tuk kapiyet keŋan etaŋ ŋep walabak.’ “
40026062	Âpme sâpe sâpe bumbu an sambeyet ŋeŋaŋinan watati Zisasiyet pigok yaŋkwesiye, “An zut egelaŋ gâgât zet bemzelut kelak ŋep nânak? Keyet geŋ dopmaŋ gilik zenzeyelen ŋen mtadik?”
40026063	Yaŋkwesime Zisasiyaŋ zet ŋen ku zeye. Ewe keyegak sâpe sâpe bumbu an sambeyet ŋeŋaŋinaŋ egat yaŋkwesiye, “Neŋ Kawawaŋ mama toŋaŋ egat kwitnanen bandim mti gayaŋkwesima geŋ zemkatik bemti dino: Geŋ Kilais Kawawaŋgat Nemuŋaŋ penaŋ?”
40026064	Zeme Zisasiyaŋ gilik zemti dunduye, “Geŋ zenik kok kemak. Keyaŋgut neŋ ilinsakwep diindowi: Kan belaknik penaŋ palaŋan in taekme Angat Nemuŋaŋaŋ neŋ Kawawaŋ winde toŋaŋgat betnaŋ penaset Amobotnaŋ tati kululuŋ mgulumbik palen kosowap!”
40026065	Zeme sâpe sâpe bumbu an sambeyet ŋeŋaŋinaŋ zet ke nâmti ŋeŋaŋ zimeyepm kâlâpmaŋ mendeleti zeye, “Egaŋ Kawawaŋgat zet mobotnaŋ min. Nin egat zet ŋen zemti zemkukuyelen ewe ku timabagalen! In alagalak kapi egalen kwelat zelak nâyo!
40026066	Keyepm in zigok nâip?” Zeme ekŋenaŋ gilik zewien, “Ek yomaŋ zemsalaŋ bepgapm gakime delaŋ pesem.”
40026067	Zemti ekŋenaŋ zimosetnan zawaga wasekpemti bet mutumti kuwien ma notnaŋaŋ bet palak palak neŋguman taiwien.
40026068	Mti zikatnaŋ kwaikpemti zewien, “Geŋ gitaŋgat golaŋ zenze an manzenik. Ele, golaŋ zenze an mulup mi! Kilais, geŋ kwiyaŋ goin? Ke zemane nâne.”
40026069	Âpme Pitayaŋ mka kimbat keŋan kayakŋaŋ totapme sâpe sâpe bumbu an sambeyelen ŋeŋaŋgalen mulup imbi ekŋenmagengatnaŋ ŋenaŋ ekmagen koti zeye, “Geŋ kogok Zisas Galiliyetnaŋmak mambanan.”
40026070	Kegok dunduye yaŋgut egaŋ ekŋen sambeyet zikalinan yaŋti zeye, “Neŋ geŋ kwiyet tazenik ke ku nâyap.”
40026071	Zemti egaŋ kimbat sekekegen metopme mulup imbi ŋenaŋ ekti an ekŋen tabien keyet zeye, “Ek Zisas Nasaletgatnaŋmak mamtan.”
40026072	Pitayaŋ ewe kogak yaŋti gilik zeye, “Neŋ penaŋ sukwep zemkatik bemti zeyap: Neŋ an ke ku nâmpeyap!”
40026073	Kegok zeme belaknik bugan tati am dendaŋ tapmambien ekŋenaŋ Pitamagen koti zewien, “Penaŋ sukwep, geŋ ekŋenmagengatnaŋ ŋen kwilekiyet zedi ŋandaŋaŋaŋ zein geŋ Galili msalengatnaŋ ekŋengat nolin!”
40026074	Zeme Pitayaŋ zeye, “Neŋ zemkatik bemti zeyap. Neŋ penaŋ sukwep penaŋ zeyap! Neŋ dâsuki zeyap beme Kawawaŋaŋ dopmaŋ ŋep mutumnasem. Neŋ an ke ku nâmpeyap penaŋ!” Zeme zeme keyegak sakokolok apmaŋaŋ kwitnaŋ kuye.
40026075	Kume Pitayaŋ eweŋan Zisasiyaŋ pigok dunduye ke otnâŋge, “Sakokolok apmaŋaŋ kwitnaŋ sek tuk ewe kukupiŋ tapme geŋ nâgât ku nâmpeyap zewanik.” Kegok mti keŋaŋ teŋ peme egaŋ zupman meti si omba penaŋ suye.
40027001	Âpme msat msame sâpe sâpe bumbu an ŋeŋaŋ sambe ma amgalen sesewat mka temaŋgalen an damuŋ ekŋenaŋ Zisas gakikiyet zenâmti zemdelaŋ zempewien.
40027002	Zemdelaŋ zemti betnaŋ zamti mtetim meti Loma gapmangalen amobotnaŋgat betnan bewien. An ke kwitnaŋ Pailet.
40027003	Âpme Zudas an zemkuku egaŋ egeyaŋ Zisaslak gakikiyet zemdelaŋ zempepeŋaŋ beme keŋaŋ gilik zeme mânep kasetnaŋ 30 silwawan mti sâpe sâpe bumbu an ŋeŋaŋ ma sesewat mka temaŋgalen an damuŋ gilik zem indamti
40027004	pigok zeye, “Neŋ an teŋ zemkuma gakikiyet zapat beme yom temaŋ tiap.” Zeme ekŋenaŋ dunduwien, “Ke ningalen kwitnaŋ kwitnaŋ yek. Ke giti nâniknok msenik.”
